du'u bu.definition: the last sumti having a {du'u}-abstraction at its topmost level inside

joibu.definition: letteral: ampersand character; especially used in standing for a mixed connective.

nu bu.definition: pro-sumti: refers to the last complete sumti that started with a nu-abstraction
nu bu.note: See {nu}. See also {du'u bu}, {ka bu}, {ni bu}.

zo'obu.definition: letteral: humor symbol, ":-)" and its related forms expressing humor (letteral).

ka bu.definition: the last sumti having a {ka}-abstraction at its topmost level inside

ni bu.definition: the last sumti having a {ni}-abstraction at its topmost level inside

ji.definition: logical connective: sumti afterthought connective question.

ba'e.definition: forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next word is especially emphasized.

za'e.definition: forethought nonce-word indicator; indicates next word is nonce-creation and may be nonstandard.

bai.definition: bapli modal, 1st place (forced by)                forcedly; compelled by force ...

ca'i.definition: catni modal, 1st place                            by authority of ...

ci'e.definition: ciste modal, 1st place used in scalar negation    in system/context ...

ci'o.definition: cinmo modal, 1st place                            emotionally felt by ...

ci'u.definition: ckilu modal, 1st place                            on the scale ...

cu'u.definition: cusku modal, 1st place (attribution/quotation)    as said by source ...; used for quotation.

de'i.definition: detri modal, 1st place (for letters)              dated ... ; attaches date stamp.

di'o.definition: diklo modal, 1st place                            in the location of ...

du'i.definition: dunli modal, 1st place (equalled by)              equally; as much as ...

du'o.definition: djuno modal, 1st place (info source)            authoritatively; according to ...; known by ...

fa'e.definition: fatne modal, 1st place                            backwards; reverse of ...

fau.definition: fasnu modal, 1st place (non-causal)               in the event of ...

ga'a.definition: zgana modal, 1st place                            to observer ... ; witnessed by ...

gau.definition: gasnu modal, 1st place agent/actor case tag       with active agent ...

ja'e.definition: jalge modal, 1st place                            resultingly; therefore result ...

ja'i.definition: javni modal, 1st place (by standard 1)            orderly; by rule ...

ji'e.definition: jimte modal, 1st place                            limitedly; up to limit ...

ji'o.definition: jitro modal, 1st place (control)                  controlledly; under direction of ...

ji'u.definition: jicmu modal, 1st place (assumptions);             given that ...; based on ...

ka'a.definition: klama modal, 1st place                            gone to by ...

ki'i.definition: ckini modal, 1st place (related to)               relatively; as a relation of ...

ki'u.definition: krinu modal, 1st place (justified by)             justifiably; because of reason ...

koi.definition: korbi modal, 1st place (bordered by)              bounded by ...

la'u.definition: klani modal, 1st place (amount)                   quantifying ...; being a quantity of ...

le'a.definition: klesi modal, 1st place (scalar set)               in/of category ...

li'e.definition: lidne modal, 1st place                            preceded by ...; non-time sequencing.

ma'e.definition: marji modal, 1st place                            material in object/substance ...

ma'i.definition: manri modal, 1st place (by standard 2)            in reference frame ...

mau.definition: zmadu modal, 1st place (a greater)                exceeded by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.

me'a.definition: mleca modal, 1st place (a lesser)                 undercut by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.

me'e.definition: cmene modal, 1st place (requires quote)           with name ...; so-called ...

mu'i.definition: mukti modal, 1st place                            because of motive ...

ni'i.definition: nibli modal, 1st place                            logically; logically because ...

pa'a.definition: panra modal, 1st place (parallel; shared property) similarly; in addition to ...

po'i.definition: porsi modal, 1st place (in order)                 sequentially; in the sequence ...

pu'e.definition: pruce modal, 1st place (in manner 1)              by process ...

ra'a.definition: srana modal, 1st place                            pertained to by ... (generally more specific).

ra'i.definition: krasi modal, 1st place                            from source/origin/starting point ...

ri'i.definition: lifri modal, 1st place patient/passive case tag; happens to...,experienced by...,with passive...

si'u.definition: sidju modal, 1st place (aiding agent)             aided by ...

tai.definition: tamsmi modal, 1st place (like)/(in manner 2)      resembling ...; sharing ideal form ...
tai.note: {tamsmi} is x_1 resembles x_2 sharing ideal form/shape x_3 in property x_4

ta'i.definition: tadji modal, 1st place (in manner 3)              methodically; by method ...

ti'i.definition: stidi modal, 1st place                            suggested by ...; proposed by ...

ti'u.definition: tcika modal, 1st place (for letters)              associated with time ... ; attach time stamp.

tu'i.definition: stuzi modal, 1st place (used to situate letters)  associated with site ... ; label with location.

va'o.definition: vanbi modal, 1st place (conditions 1)             under conditions ...; in environment ...

va'u.definition: xamgu modal, 1st place beneficiary case tag complement  benefiting from ...

zu'e.definition: zukte modal, 1st place (purposed agent)           with goal-seeking actor ...

be.definition: sumti link to attach sumti (default x_2) to a selbri; used in descriptions.

be'o.definition: elidable terminator: end linked sumti in specified description.

bei.definition: separates multiple linked sumti within a selbri; used in descriptions.

bi'e.definition: prefixed to a mex operator to indicate high priority.

bi'i.definition: non-logical interval connective: unordered between ... and ...

bi'o.definition: non-logical interval connective: ordered from ... to ...

mi'i.definition: non-logical interval connective: ordered components: ... center, ... range surrounding center.

bo.definition: short scope joiner; joins various constructs with shortest scope and right grouping.

boi.definition: elidable terminator: terminate numeral or letteral string.

bu.definition: convert any single word to BY.

se'e.definition: following digits code a character (in ASCII, Unicode, etc.).

ka'e.definition: modal aspect: innate capability; possibly unrealized.

nu'o.definition: modal aspect: can but has not; unrealized potential.

pu'i.definition: modal aspect: can and has; demonstrated potential.

pei.definition: attitudinal: attitudinal question; how do you feel about it? with what intensity?.

ce'e.definition: links terms into an afterthought termset.

cei.definition: selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a selbri.
cei.note: Note: Directionality of assignment may be ambiguous. {ca'e} on the "toward" side may be used to disambiguate.

co.definition: tanru inversion operator; "... of type ..."; allows modifier trailing sumti without sumti links.

fi'i.definition: vocative: hospitality - inhospitality; you are welcome/ make yourself at home.

je'e.definition: vocative: roger (ack) - negative acknowledge; used to acknowledge offers and thanks.

ju'i.definition: vocative: attention - at ease - ignore me.

ki'e.definition: vocative: thanks - no thanks to you.

mi'e.definition: self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; identifies speaker.

mu'o.definition: vocative: over (response OK) - more to come.

re'i.definition: vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.

cu.definition: elidable marker: separates selbri from preceding sumti, allows preceding terminator elision.

nau.definition: tense: refers to current space/time reference absolutely.

doi.definition: generic vocative marker; identifies intended listener; elidable after COI.

fa.definition: sumti place tag: tag 1st sumti place.

fai.definition: sumti place tag: tag a sumti moved out of numbered place structure; used in modal conversions.

fe.definition: sumti place tag: tag 2nd sumti place.

fi.definition: sumti place tag: tag 3rd sumti place.

fi'a.definition: sumti place tag: place structure number/tag question.

fo.definition: sumti place tag: tag 4th sumti place.

fu.definition: sumti place tag: tag 5th sumti place.

ca'u.definition: location tense relation/direction; forwards/to the front of ...

ri'u.definition: location tense relation/direction; rightwards/to the right of ...

ti'a.definition: location tense relation/direction; rearwards/to the rear of ...

zu'a.definition: location tense relation/direction; leftwards/to the left of ...

bu'u.definition: location tense relation/direction; coincident with/at the same place as; space equivalent of ca.

te'e.definition: location tense relation/direction; edged by/edging up to ...

fa'a.definition: location tense relation/direction; arriving at/directly towards ...

to'o.definition: location tense relation/direction; departing from/directly away from ...

zo'a.definition: location tense relation/direction; tangential to/passing by ...

zo'i.definition: location tense relation/direction; nearer than .../inward/approaching from ...

fa'o.definition: unconditional end of text; outside regular grammar; used for computer input.

fe'e.definition: mark space interval distributive aspects; labels interval tense modifiers as location-oriented.

fe'u.definition: elidable terminator: end nonce conversion of selbri to modal; usually elidable.

fi'o.definition: convert selbri to nonce modal/sumti tag.

foi.definition: terminator: end composite lerfu; never elidable.

fu'a.definition: reverse Polish mathematical expression (mex) operator flag.

fu'o.definition: end indicator long scope; terminates scope of all active indicators.

ga.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal or (with gi).

ge.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal and (with gi).

ge'i.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal connective question (with gi).

go.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru internal biconditional/iff/if-and-only-if(with gi).

gu.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal whether-or-not (with gi).

ga'o.definition: closed interval bracket marker; mod. intervals in non-logical connectives; include boundaries.

ke'i.definition: open interval bracket marker; modifies intervals in non-logical connectives; exclude boundaries.

ge'u.definition: elidable terminator: end GOI relative phrases; usually elidable in non-complex phrases.

gi.definition: logical connective: all but tanru-internal forethought connective medial marker.

gi'i.definition: logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought conn question.

bu'a.definition: logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 1.

bu'e.definition: logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 2.

bu'i.definition: logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 3.

du.definition: identity selbri; = sign; x_1 identically equals x_2, x_3, etc.; attached sumti refer to same thing.

go'a.definition: pro-bridi: repeats a recent bridi (usually not the last 2).

go'e.definition: pro-bridi: repeats the next to last bridi.

go'i.definition: pro-bridi: preceding bridi; in answer to a yes/no question, repeats the claim, meaning yes.

go'o.definition: pro-bridi: repeats a future bridi, normally the next one.

go'u.definition: pro-bridi: repeats a remote past bridi.

no'a.definition: pro-bridi: repeats the bridi in which this one is embedded.

goi.definition: sumti assignment; used to define/assign ko'a/fo'a series pro-sumti; Latin 'sive'.
goi.note: Note: Directionality of assignment may be ambiguous. {ca'e} on the "toward" side may be used to disambiguate.

ne.definition: non-restrictive relative phrase marker: which incidentally is associated with ...

no'u.definition: non-restrictive appositive phrase marker: which incidentally is the same thing as ...

pe.definition: restrictive relative phrase marker: which is associated with ...; loosest associative/possessive.

po.definition: restrictive relative phrase marker: which is specific to ...; normal possessive physical/legal.

po'e.definition: restrictive relative phrase marker: which belongs to ... ; inalienable possession.

po'u.definition: restrictive appositive phrase marker: which is the same thing as.

gu'a.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought or (with gi).

gu'e.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought and (with gi).

gu'i.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought question (with gi).

gu'o.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought biconditional/iff/if-and-only-if (with gi).

gu'u.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought whether-or-not (with gi).

i.definition: sentence link/continuation; continuing sentences on same topic; normally elided for new speakers.

je'i.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought conn question.

jai.definition: convert tense/modal (tagged) place to 1st place; 1st place moves to extra FA place (fai).

jo'i.definition: join mathematical expression (mex) operands into an array.

ce.definition: non-logical connective: set link, unordered; "and also", but forming a set.

ce'o.definition: non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; "and then", forming a sequence.

fa'u.definition: non-logical connective: respectively; unmixed ordered distributed association.

joi.definition: non-logical connective: mixed conjunction; "and" meaning "mixed together", forming a mass.

jo'u.definition: non-logical connective: in common with; along with (unmixed).

ju'e.definition: vague non-logical connective: analogous to plain ".i".

pi'u.definition: non-logical connective: cross product; Cartesian product of sets.

ke.definition: start grouping of tanru, etc; ... type of ... ; overrides normal tanru left grouping.

ke'e.definition: elidable terminator: end of tanru left grouping override (usually elidable).

kei.definition: elidable terminator: end abstraction bridi (often elidable).

ki.definition: tense/modal: set/use tense default; establishes new open scope space/time/modal reference base.

da.definition: logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 1 (usually restricted).

de.definition: logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 2 (usually restricted).

di.definition: logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 3 (usually restricted).

da'e.definition: pro-sumti: remote future utterance; "He'll tell you tomorrow. IT will be a doozy.".

da'u.definition: pro-sumti: a remote past utterance; "She couldn't have known that IT would be true.".

do.definition: pro-sumti: you listener(s); identified by vocative.

do'o.definition: pro-sumti: you the listener & others unspecified.

ko.definition: pro-sumti: you (imperative); make it true for you, the listener.

ma'a.definition: pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s) & you the listener(s) & others unspecified.

mi.definition: pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s); identified by self-vocative.

mi'a.definition: pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s) & others unspecified, but not you, the listener.

mi'o.definition: pro-sumti: me/we the speaker(s)/author(s) & you the listener(s).

vo'a.definition: pro-sumti: repeats 1st place of main bridi of this sentence.

vo'e.definition: pro-sumti: repeats 2nd place of main bridi of this sentence.

vo'i.definition: pro-sumti: repeats 3rd place of main bridi of this sentence.

vo'o.definition: pro-sumti: repeats 4th place of main bridi of this sentence.

vo'u.definition: pro-sumti: repeats 5th place of main bridi of this sentence.

ra.definition: pro-sumti: a recent sumti before the last one, as determined by back-counting rules.

ri.definition: pro-sumti: the last sumti, as determined by back-counting rules.

ru.definition: pro-sumti: a remote past sumti, before all other in-use backcounting sumti.

ta.definition: pro-sumti: that there; nearby demonstrative it; indicated thing/place near listener.

ti.definition: pro-sumti: this here; immediate demonstrative it; indicated thing/place near speaker.

tu.definition: pro-sumti: that yonder; distant demonstrative it; indicated thing far from speaker&listener.

ke'a.definition: pro-sumti: relativized sumti (object of relative clause).

ma.definition: pro-sumti: sumti question (what/who/how/why/etc.); appropriately fill in sumti blank.

zi'o.definition: pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place structure;changes selbri semantics.

zo'e.definition: pro-sumti: an elliptical/unspecified value; has some value which makes bridi true.

zu'i.definition: pro-sumti: the typical sumti value for this place in this relationship; affects truth value.

ce'u.definition: pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that represents an open place.

ku.definition: elidable terminator: end description, modal, or negator sumti; often elidable.

ku'e.definition: elidable terminator: end mathematical (mex) forethought (Polish) expression; often elidable.

ku'o.definition: elidable terminator: end NOI relative clause; always elidable, but preferred in complex clauses.

la.definition: name descriptor: the one(s) called ... ; takes name or selbri description.

lai.definition: name descriptor: the mass of individual(s) named ... ; takes name or selbri description.

la'i.definition: name descriptor: the set of those named ... ; takes name or selbri description.

la'e.definition: the referent of (indirect pointer); uses the referent of a sumti as the desired sumti.

lu'a.definition: the members of the set/components of the mass; converts another description type to individuals.

lu'e.definition: the symbol for (indirect discourse); uses the symbol/word(s) for a sumti as the desired sumti.

lu'i.definition: the set with members; converts another description type to a set of the members.

lu'o.definition: the mass composed of; converts another description type to a mass composed of the members.

tu'a.definition: extracts a concrete sumti from an unspecified abstraction; equivalent to le nu/su'u [sumti] co'e.

vu'i.definition: sumti qualifier: the sequence made from set or composed of elements/components; order is vague.

ce'a.definition: 2-word letteral/shift: the word following indicates a new font (e.g. italics, manuscript).

lau.definition: 2-word letteral/shift: punctuation mark or special symbol follows.

tau.definition: 2-word letteral/shift: change case for next letteral only.

le.definition: non-veridical descriptor: the one(s) described as ...

le'e.definition: non-veridical descriptor: the stereotype of those described as ...

lei.definition: non-veridical descriptor: the mass of individual(s) described as ...

le'i.definition: non-veridical descriptor: the set of those described as ..., treated as a set.

lo.definition: descriptor: the one, which (is / does) ... / those, which (are / do) ...
lo.note: Terminated with {ku}. Under the xorlo reform, {lo} converts a selbri to a sumti in a generic way. In particular, lo broda = {zo'e} noi broda.

lo'e.definition: veridical descriptor: the typical one(s) who really is(are) ...

loi.definition: veridical descriptor: the mass of individual(s) that is(are) ...

lo'i.definition: veridical descriptor: the set of those that really are ..., treated as a set.

le'u.definition: end quote of questionable or out-of-context text; not elidable.

li.definition: the number/evaluated expression; convert number/operand/evaluated math expression to sumti.

me'o.definition: the mathematical expression (unevaluated); convert unevaluated mathematical expression to sumti.

li'u.definition: elidable terminator: end grammatical quotation; seldom elidable except at end of text.

lo'o.definition: elidable terminator: end math express.(mex) sumti; end mex-to-sumti conversion; usually elidable.

lo'u.definition: start questionable/out-of-context quote; text should be Lojban words, but needn't be grammatical.

lu.definition: start grammatical quotation; quoted text should be grammatical on its own.

lu'u.definition: elidable terminator: end of sumti qualifiers; usually elidable except before a sumti.

ma'o.definition: convert letteral string or other mathematical expression (mex) operand to mex operator.

mai.definition: utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to an ordinal, such as an item or paragraph number.

mo'o.definition: higher-order utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to ordinal, usually a section/chapter.

me.definition: convert sumti to selbri/tanru element; x_1 is specific to [sumti] in aspect x_2.

me'u.definition: elidable terminator: end sumti that was converted to selbri; usually elidable.

mo'e.definition: convert sumti to mex operand; sample use in story arithmetic: [3 apples] + [3 apples] = what.

cu'o.definition: convert number to probability selbri; event x_1 has probability (n) of occurring under cond. x_2.

mei.definition: convert number to cardinality selbri; x_1 is the mass formed from set x_2 whose n member(s) are x_3.
mei.note: [x_1 is a mass with N components x_3 composing set x_2; x_2 is an n-tuple (x_2 is completely specified) (= {selmei} for reordered places); x_1 forms an n-some; x_3 (not necessarily a complete enumeration) are among the members of x_2]; See also {cmima}, {gunma}, cmavo list {moi}.

moi.definition: convert number to ordinal selbri; x_1 is (n)th member of set x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

si'e.definition: convert number to portion selbri; x_1 is an (n)th portion of mass/totality x_2; (cf. gunma).

va'e.definition: convert number to scalar selbri; x_1 is at (n)th position on scale x_2.

ja'a.definition: bridi logical affirmer; scope is an entire bridi.

na.definition: bridi contradictory negator; scope is an entire bridi; logically negates in some cmavo compounds.

je'a.definition: scalar affirmer; denies scalar negation: Indeed!.

na'e.definition: contrary scalar negator: other than ...; not ...; a scale or set is implied.

no'e.definition: midpoint scalar negator: neutral point between je'a and to'e; "not really".

na'u.definition: convert selbri to mex operator; used to create less-used operators using fu'ivla, lujvo, etc.

nai.definition: attached to cmavo to negate them; various negation-related meanings.

ni'e.definition: convert selbri to mex operand; used to create new non-numerical quantifiers; e.g. "herd" of oxen.

ni'o.definition: discursive: paragraph break; introduce new topic.

no'i.definition: discursive: paragraph break; resume previous topic.

noi.definition: non-restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with incidental information.

poi.definition: restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with identifying information to a sumti.

voi.definition: non-veridical restrictive clause used to form complicated le-like descriptions using "ke'a".

du'u.definition: abstractor: predication/bridi abstractor; x_1 is predication [bridi] expressed in sentence x_2.

jei.definition: abstractor: truth-value abstractor; x_1 is truth value of [bridi] under epistemology x_2.

ka.definition: abstractor: property/quality abstractor (-ness); x_1 is quality/property exhibited by [bridi].

li'i.definition: abstractor: experience abstractor; x_1 is x_2's experience of [bridi] (participant or observer).

ni.definition: abstractor: quantity/amount abstractor; x_1 is quantity/amount of [bridi] measured on scale x_2.

nu.definition: abstractor: generalized event abstractor; x_1 is state/process/achievement/activity of [bridi].

si'o.definition: abstractor: idea/concept abstractor; x_1 is x_2's concept of [bridi].

su'u.definition: abstractor: generalized abstractor (how); x_1 is [bridi] as a non-specific abstraction of type x_2.

mu'e.definition: abstractor: achievement (event) abstractor; x_1 is the event-as-a-point/achievement of [bridi].

pu'u.definition: abstractor: process (event) abstractor; x_1 is process of [bridi] proceeding in stages x_2.

za'i.definition: abstractor: state (event) abstractor; x_1 is continuous state of [bridi] being true.

zu'o.definition: abstractor: activity (event) abstractor; x_1 is abstract activity of [bridi] composed of x_2.

nu'a.definition: convert mathematical expression (mex) operator to a selbri/tanru component.

nu'i.definition: start forethought termset construct; marks start of place structure set with logical connection.

nu'u.definition: elidable terminator: end forethought termset; usually elidable except with following sumti.

fi'u.definition: digit/number: fraction slash; default "/n" => 1/n, "n/" => n/1, or "/" alone => golden ratio.

ma'u.definition: digit/number: plus sign; positive number; default any positive.

ni'u.definition: digit/number: minus sign; negative number); default any negative.

pi.definition: digit/number: radix (number base) point; default decimal.

pi'e.definition: digit/number:separates digits for base >16, not current standard, or variable (e.g. time, date).

ra'e.definition: digit/number: repeating digits (of a decimal) follow.

da'a.definition: digit/number: all except n; all but n; default 1.

ji'i.definition: digit/number: approximately (default the typical value in this context) (number).

su'e.definition: digit/number: at most (all); no more than.

su'o.definition: digit/number: at least (some); no less than.

ci'i.definition: digit/number: infinity; followed by digits => aleph cardinality.

ka'o.definition: digit/number: imaginary i; square root of -1.

pai.definition: digit/number: pi (approximately 3.1416...); the constant defined by the ratio of the circumference to the diameter of all circles.

tu'o.definition: null operand (used in unary mekso operations).

pe'e.definition: marks the following connective as joining termsets.

pe'o.definition: forethought flag for mathematical expression (mex) Polish (forethought) operator.

ba.definition: time tense relation/direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti]; default future tense.

ca.definition: time tense relation/direction: is [selbri]; during/simultaneous with [sumti]; present tense.

pu.definition: time tense relation/direction: did [selbri]; before/prior to [sumti]; default past tense.

ra'o.definition: flag GOhA to indicate pro-assignment context updating for all pro-assigns in referenced bridi.

re'u.definition: converts number to an objectively quantified ordinal tense interval modifier; defaults to time.

roi.definition: converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval modifier; defaults to time tense.

sa.definition: erase complete or partial utterance; next word shows how much erasing to do.

se'u.definition: elidable terminator: end discursive bridi or mathematical precedence;usually elidable.

si.definition: erase the last Lojban word, treating non-Lojban text as a single word.

soi.definition: discursive: reciprocal sumti marker; indicates a reciprocal relationship between sumti.

su.definition: erase to start of discourse or text; drop subject or start over.

di'i.definition: tense interval modifier: regularly; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

na'o.definition: tense interval modifier: characteristically/typically; tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

ru'i.definition: tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

ta'e.definition: tense interval modifier: habitually; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

te'u.definition: elidable terminator: end conversion between non-mex and mex; usually elidable.

tei.definition: composite letteral follows; used for multi-character letterals.

to.definition: left parenthesis; start of parenthetical note which must be grammatical Lojban text.

to'i.definition: open editorial unquote (within a quote); contains grammatical text; mark with editorial insert.

toi.definition: elidable terminator: right parenthesis/end unquote; seldom elidable except at end of text.

tu'e.definition: start of multiple utterance scope; used for logical/non-logical/ordinal joining of sentences.

tu'u.definition: elidable terminator: end multiple utterance scope; seldom elidable.

a'i.definition: attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose.

e'i.definition: attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.

iu.definition: attitudinal: love - no love lost - hatred.

ue.definition: attitudinal: surprise - not really surprised - expectation.

u'u.definition: attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.

ba'a.definition: evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember.

ka'u.definition: evidential: I know by cultural means (myth or custom).

se'o.definition: evidential: I know by internal experience (dream, vision, or personal revelation).

su'a.definition: evidential: I generalize - I particularize; discursive: abstractly - concretely.

mu'a.definition: discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.

ta'o.definition: discursive: by the way - returning to main point.

va'i.definition: discursive: in other words - in the same words.

zu'u.definition: discursive: on the one hand - on the other hand.

bi'u.definition: discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information.

kau.definition: discursive: marks word serving as focus of indirect question: "I know WHO went to the store".

sa'a.definition: discursive: material inserted by editor/narrator (bracketed text).

ta'u.definition: discursive: expanding the tanru - making a tanru.

po'o.definition: discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case.

pe'a.definition: marks a construct as figurative (non-literal/metaphorical) speech/text.

dai.definition: attitudinal modifier: marks empathetic use of preceding attitudinal; shows another's feelings.

ga'i.definition: attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of lower rank.

ri'e.definition: attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint.

ge'e.definition: attitudinal: elliptical/unspecified/non-specific emotion; no particular feeling.

ki'a.definition: attitudinal question: confusion about something said.

bu'o.definition: attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

va.definition: location tense distance: near to ... ; there at ...; a medium/small distance from ...

vi.definition: location tense distance: here at ... ; at or a very short/tiny distance from ...

vu.definition: location tense distance: far from ... ; yonder at ... ; a long distance from ...

vau.definition: elidable: end of sumti in simple bridi; in compound bridi, separates common trailing sumti.

ve'a.definition: location tense interval: a small/medium region of space.

ve'e.definition: location tense interval: the whole of space.

ve'i.definition: location tense interval: a tiny region of space.

ve'u.definition: location tense interval: a large region of space.

vi'a.definition: dimensionality of space interval tense: 2-space interval; throughout an area.

vi'e.definition: dimensionality of space interval tense: 4-space interval; throughout a spacetime.

vi'i.definition: dimensionality of space interval tense: 1-space interval; along a line.

vi'u.definition: dimensionality of space interval tense: 3-space interval; throughout a space.

vu'o.definition: joins relative clause/phrase to complete complex or logically connected sumti in afterthought.

fu'u.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: elliptical/unspecified mathematical expression (mex) operator.

ge'a.definition: mathematical operator: null mathematical expression (mex) operator (used in >2-ary ops).

fe'i.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: divided by; division operator; [(((a / b) / c) / ...)].

pi'i.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: times; multiplication operator; [(((a * b) * c) * ...)].

su'i.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: plus; addition operator; [(((a + b) + c) + ...)].

vu'u.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: minus; subtraction operator; [(((a - b) - c) - ...)].

fa'i.definition: unary mathematical operator: reciprocal; multiplicative inverse; [1/a].

gei.definition: trinary mathematical operator: order of magnitude/value/base; [b * (c to the a power)].

ju'u.definition: binary mathematical operator: number base; [a interpreted in the base b].

pa'i.definition: binary mathematical operator: ratio; [the ratio of a to b].

te'a.definition: binary mathematical operator: to the power; exponential; [a to the b power].

de'o.definition: binary mathematical operator: logarithm; [log/ln a to base b]; default base 10 or e.

fe'a.definition: binary mathematical operator: nth root of; inverse power [a to the 1/b power].

va'a.definition: unary mathematical operator: additive inverse; [- a].

pi'a.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: operands are vectors to be treated as matrix rows.

re'a.definition: unary mathematical operator: matrix transpose/dual; A*.

ri'o.definition: trinary mathematical operator: [integral of a with respect to b over range c].

sa'i.definition: n-ary mathematical operator: operands are vectors to be treated as matrix columns.

sa'o.definition: trinary mathematical operator: [derivative of a with respect to b of degree c].

si'i.definition: trinary mathematical operator: [sigma summation of a using variable b over range c].

xi.definition: subscript; attaches a number of letteral string following as a subscript onto grammar structures.

y.definition: hesitation noise; maintains the floor while speaker decides what to say next.
y.note: Note: completely invisible to grammar (except in the cluster {ybu}), and thus can't even be quoted by {zo}. Use "lo {depsna}" instead if you wish to refer to the "word" {y} itself. See {denpa}, {sance}

ba'o.definition: interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...; retrospective/perfect              |     |----.

co'a.definition: interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative                   >|<    |.

co'i.definition: interval event contour: at the instantaneous point of ...; achievative/perfective; point event   >|<.

co'u.definition: interval event contour: at the ending point of ... even if not done; cessative      |  >< |.

de'a.definition: event contour for a temporary halt and ensuing pause in a process.

di'a.definition: event contour for resumption of a paused process.

mo'u.definition: interval event contour: at the natural ending point of ...; completive              |    >|<.

pu'o.definition: interval event contour: in anticipation of ...;  until ... ; inchoative         ----|     |.

za'o.definition: interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of ...; superfective  |     ---->.

ze'a.definition: time tense interval: a medium length of time.

ze'e.definition: time tense interval: the whole of time.

ze'i.definition: time tense interval: an instantaneous/tiny/short amount of time.

ze'u.definition: time tense interval: a long amount of time.

zei.definition: joins preceding and following words into a lujvo.
zei.note: To make tanru out of arbitrary cmavo, use {ze'oi} instead.

za.definition: time tense distance: medium distance in time.

zi.definition: time tense distance: instantaneous-to-short distance in time.

zu.definition: time tense distance: long distance in time.

zi'e.definition: joins relative clauses which apply to the same sumti.

zo.definition: quote next word only; quotes a single Lojban word (not a cmavo compound or tanru).

zo'u.definition: marks end of logical prenex quantifiers/topic identification and start of sentence bridi.

la'o.definition: delimited non-Lojban name; the resulting quote sumti is treated as a name.

zoi.definition: delimited non-Lojban quotation; the result treated as a block of text.

enai.definition: logical connective: sumti afterthought x but not y.

na.a.definition: logical connective: sumti afterthought conditional/only if.

onai.definition: logical connective: sumti afterthought exclusive or; Latin 'aut'.

sebe'ei.definition: benre modal, 2nd place, which is the beneficiary of...

cu'u ko'a.definition: tagged sumti: can be used for embedded: it-1 said, "...", with editorial unquote and insert.

ja'enai.definition: na'e jalge modal, 1st place (event causal); without result ...

ki'u ma.definition: sumti question asking for a rational explanation/justification; why?.

ki'unai.definition: na'e krinu modal, 1st place; regardless of

la'u ma.definition: sumti question asking for a quantity; how many?.

me'e ma.definition: sumti question asking for a name; who?; requires quoted name as an answer.

mu'i ma.definition: sumti question asking for a motive; why?.

mu'inai.definition: na'e mukti modal, 1st place; regardless of motive ...

ni'i ma.definition: sumti question asking for a logical proof; why?.

ni'inai.definition: na'e nibli modal, 1st place; regardless of logically sufficient condition ...

pa'aku.definition: sumti: explicitly marks respective use as in "THEY read THEIR (respective) books".

ri'a ma.definition: sumti question asking for a physical cause; why?.

ka'enai.definition: modal aspect: impossible to be realized

na'epu'i.definition: modal aspect: has never, and perhaps cannot; other-than-demonstrated-ability.

je'enai.definition: vocative: roger (ack) - negative acknowledge; I didn't hear you.

ju'icu'i.definition: vocative: attention - at ease - ignore me.

ju'inai.definition: vocative: attention - at ease - ignore me.

ki'enai.definition: vocative: thanks - no thanks to you.

mi'enai.definition: self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; denies identity of speaker.

mu'onai.definition: vocative: over (response OK) - more to come.

re'inai.definition: vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.

jo'aunai.note: Used to express that a {jo'au}-dialect is not currently being used. E.g. "jo'aunai {tcekitaujau}"

fe'enau.definition: tense: right here; refers to current spatial reference absolutely
fe'enau.note: *Note: Not currently accepted by grammar parsers.* It may be desirable to separate the spatial and time senses of the word {nau}; this is one proposed solution. Alternative: {bu'u} {nau'u}. See {zva'ati}, {ca'abna}

doido'u.definition: generic vocative address to intended listener;.

doinai.definition: anti-vocative: specifically denies that the referent is the intended listener.
doinai.note: *Note: Only accepted by experimental grammar* (u'u doinai la .djon.) = "Sorry, I wasn't talking to you, John". May also be used alone if the referent is obvious from context.

mo'ibe'a.definition: space motion tense: northwardly; to the north directional space motion.

mo'ibu'u.definition: space motion tense: moving to coincide directional space motion.

mo'ica'u.definition: space motion tense: forward directional space motion.

mo'idu'a.definition: space motion tense: eastwardly; to the east directional space motion.

mo'idu'oi.definition: space motion tense: clockwisely; to the clockwise angular-directional space motion.

mo'ifa'a.definition: space motion tense: arriving at; arriving at a point directional space motion.

mo'iga'u.definition: space motion tense: upwardly; upwards directional space motion.

mo'ine'a.definition: space motion tense: approximating; moving around the neighborhood of ... space motion.

mo'ine'i.definition: space motion tense: moving into directional space motion.

mo'ine'u.definition: space motion tense: southwardly; to the south directional space motion.

mo'ini'a.definition: space motion tense: downwardly; downwards directional space motion.

mo'ipa'o.definition: space motion tense: passing through directional space motion.

mo'ire'o.definition: space motion tense: along; along a path directional space motion.

mo'iri'u.definition: space motion tense: rightwardly; to the right directional space motion.

mo'iru'u.definition: space motion tense: orbiting; surrounding/annular directional space motion.

mo'ite'e.definition: space motion tense: moving along the border directional space motion.

mo'iti'a.definition: space motion tense: rearwardsly; rearwards directional space motion.

mo'ito'o.definition: space motion tense: moving away from a point directional space motion.

mo'ivu'a.definition: space motion tense: westwardly; to the west directional space motion.

mo'ize'o.definition: space motion tense: outwardsly; outward directional space motion.

mo'izo'a.definition: space motion tense: passing by a site directional space motion.

mo'izo'i.definition: space motion tense: approaching directional space motion.

mo'izu'a.definition: space motion tense: leftwardsly; to the left directional space motion.

mo'izu'au.definition: space motion tense: counterclockwisely; to the counterclockwise angular-directional space motion.

na'efa'a.definition: space direction: not towards specified point, contrary negation; direction modal.

ganai.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal conditional/only if (with gi).

gonai.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal exclusive or (with gi); Latin 'aut'.

gi'enai.definition: logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought x but not y.

gi'onai.definition: logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought exclusive or; Latin 'aut'.

nagi'a.definition: logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought conditional/only if.

go'ira'o.definition: pro-bridi: preceding bridi; repeats claim as true, updating for speaker/listener change.

nago'i.definition: selbri: repeats preceding bridi while denying it as false; pro-assign values are unchanged.

pecai.definition: restrictive relative phrase marker: permanently / inalienably associated with; it is impossible or near-impossible to break that relation
pecai.note: Proposed as a variation of {po'e} with less semantic-boundary difficulties, while freeing up {po'e} for reassignment in dialects/forks. Most words that the concept of 'inalienable possession' applies to, e.g. {birka}, {mamta}, or even {pendo} in some natlangs, have a convenient {be} place to be used instead with a better-defined meaning. However, this may be used for any relation that is impossible-or-nigh-impossible to break, e.g. the car you worked on and made custom modifications to for years; in a sense, it will still be "your car" even if you sold it. {do'e}{cai} could be a variation to associate a bridi or the subject of the bridi, e.g. 'ti karce do'ecai mi'. See also {pesai}, {pe}

pesai.definition: restrictive relative phrase marker: semi-permanently associated to; will remain associated unless something breaks that relation
pesai.note: Proposed as a variation of {po} with less semantic-boundary difficulties, while freeing up {po} for reassignment in dialects/forks. Legal ownership is a possible relation; it could also mean, say, the chair assigned to you in an office, which will remain 'your' chair until reassigned, where mere {pe} could just mean the one you're sitting on. {do'e}{sai} could be a variation to associate a bridi or the subject of the bridi, e.g. 'ti stizu do'esai mi'. See {pecai}, {pe}, {ponse}, {po'a}

gu'anai.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought conditional/only if (with gi).

gu'onai.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal forethought exclusive or (with gi); Latin 'aut'.

ijanai.definition: logical connective: sentence afterthought: (preceding sentence) if this sentence.

ije'i.definition: logical connective: sentence afterthought conn question.

ijenai.definition: logical connective: sentence afterthought x but not y.

ijonai.definition: logical connective: sentence afterthought exclusive or; Latin 'aut'.

inaja.definition: logical connective: sentence afterthought conditional/only if.

jenai.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought x but not y.

jonai.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought exclusive or; Latin 'aut'.

naja.definition: logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought conditional/only if.

la'edi'u.definition: pro-sumti: the referent of the last utterance; the state described: "IT was fun".

le go'i.definition: description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_1 of the previous bridi.

le sego'i.definition: description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_2 of the previous bridi.

le tego'i.definition: description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_3 of the previous bridi.

le vego'i.definition: description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_4 of the previous bridi.

le xego'i.definition: description pro-sumti: reuses the value of the x_5 of the previous bridi.

loroda.definition: all the things (in our universe of discourse)

noda.definition: logically quantified sumti: nothing at all (unless restricted).

roda.definition: logically quantified universal sumti: everything (unless restricted).

ledo.definition: possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of yours.

le jaica.definition: description: marks description extracting the time tense place of the description bridi.

le jaigau.definition: description: marks description extracting the agentive place of the description selbri.

le jaivi.definition: description: marks description extracting the location place of the description bridi.

leko'a.definition: possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of it-1's.

lemi.definition: possessive/associative descriptor: the one(s) described as, of mine.

lenu.definition: specific event descriptor: contraction of {le nu} and identical in meaning.
lenu.note: Added because beginners often search for {lenu} without realizing that it is the same as {le} {nu} and getting confused.

leta.definition: possessive/associative descriptor: nearby demonstrative possessive; cannot use for 'THAT ...'.

leti.definition: possessive/associative descriptor: immediate demonstrative possessive; cannot use for 'THIS ...'.

lonu.definition: event descriptor: contraction of {lo nu} and identical in meaning.
lonu.note: Added because beginners often search for {lonu} without realizing that it is the same as {lo} {nu} and getting confused.

nomo'o.definition: discursive utterance ordinal: zeroth section/chapter ordinal; foreword.

pamo'o.definition: discursive utterance ordinal: first section/chapter ordinal.

romai.definition: discursive utterance ordinal: finally; last utterance ordinal.

bimei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 8 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the octet of members x_2.

bimoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 8 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is eighth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

cimei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 3 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the trio of members x_2.

cimoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 3 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is third among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

da'amei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert all but one to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with all but one members x_2.

da'amoi.definition: quantified selbri: converts all-but-(1) to ordinal selbri; x_1 is penultimate among x_2 by rule x_3.

da'aremoi.definition: quantified selbri: converts all-but-2 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is antepenult. among x_2 by rule x_3.

du'emei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert too many to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with too many members x_2.

mumei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 5 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the quintet of members x_2.

mumoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 5 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is fifth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

pamei.definition: quantified selbri: convert 1 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with single/sole/only member x_2.

pamoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 1 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is first among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

panomei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 10 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the decade of members x_2.

panomoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 10 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is tenth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

panonomei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 100 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the century of members x_2.

paremei.definition: quantified selbri: convert 12 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with a dozen members x_2.

pimucu'o.definition: quantified selbri: convert .5 to probability selbri; event x_1 has a 50/50 chance under cond. x_2.

piresi'e.definition: quantified selbri: convert .2 = 1/5 to portion selbri; x_1 is 1/5 of mass/totality x_2.

pirosi'e.definition: quantified selbri: converts all-of to portion selbri; x_1 is the whole portion of mass x_2.

raumei.definition: quantified selbri: converts enough to cardinal; x_1 is a set with members x_2, enough by std. x_3.

raumoi.definition: quantified selbri: converts enough to ordinal; x_1 is enoughth among x_2, order rule x_3.

remei.definition: quantified selbri: convert 2 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the pair of members x_2.

remoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 2 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is second among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

renomei.definition: quantifier selbri: convert 20 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with the score of members x_2.

romoi.definition: quantified selbri: is final among; convert all to ordinal selbri; x_1 is last among x_2, rule x_3.

so'imei.definition: quantified selbri: convert many to cardinal; x_1 is a set with many members x_2 of total set x_3.

somoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 9 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is ninth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

su'oremei.definition: quantified selbri: convert at least 2 to cardinal selbri; x_1 is a set with plural membership x_2.

su'oremoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert at least 2 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is at-least-2nd among x_2 by rule x_3.

vomoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 4 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is fourth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

xamoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 6 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is sixth among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

zemoi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 7 to ordinal selbri; x_1 is seventh among x_2 ordered by rule x_3.

ja'aru'e.definition: weak bridi affirmation; barely; almost not at all.

naru'e.definition: weak bridi negation; almost, but not quite.

je'abo.definition: negation sumti qualifier: that which indeed is.

na'ebo.definition: negation sumti qualifier: something other than.

no'ebo.definition: negation sumti qualifier: the neutral form/value of.

to'ebo.definition: negation sumti qualifier: the opposite of.

ja'aku.definition: (adverbial) bridi logical affirmer; "it is true that...."; affirms the bridi as well as any other adverbial or quantifier located on its right.

naku.definition: (adverbial) bridi contradictory negator; "it is not true that...."; negates the bridi as well as any other adverbial or quantifier located on its right.

du'ukau.definition: bridi abstractor: x_1 is the answer to the question x_2
du'ukau.note: Experimental cmavo compound. Equivalent to {du'u} with {kau} attached to all question words (e.g. {ma}, {mo}, {xo}) contained. See {preti}, {danfu}, {du'umrei}

li'i ze'ei ka.definition: abstractor: experience of being: x_1 is x_2's experience of being [bridi] (property of x_2; with {ce'u} referring to x_2's position)

li'i ze'ei nu.definition: abstractor: experience of event: x_1 is x_2's experience of observing or participating in [bridi] (event)

sedu'u.definition: compound abstractor: sentence/equation abstract; x_1 is text expressing [bridi] which is x_2.

si'o ze'ei du'u.definition: abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of [bridi] (proposition or {kau}-question)

si'o ze'ei ka.definition: abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the property [bridi]

si'o ze'ei nu.definition: abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the event [bridi]

si'o ze'ei poi'i.definition: abstractor: x_1 is x_2's concept of the object bound to {ke'a} and described by [bridi]

ji'ima'u.definition: rounded up (appended after string of digits indicating a rounded value).

ji'ini'u.definition: rounded down (appended after string of digits indicating a rounded value).

panoki'oki'o.definition: number/quantity: 10,000,000 [ten millions](Western numbering system/1,00,00,000 [100 lakhs](Indian numbering system).

panonoki'o.definition: number/quantity: 100,000 [hundred thousand](Western numbering system)/[one lakh](Indian numbering system)..

pisoi'a.definition: almost all of/almost 1/almost surely/almost certainly (technical sense)

pisoi'u.definition: almost none of/almost 0/almost never/almost certainly not/nearly nothing of (technical sense)

da'ane'e.definition: digit/number: counting from least contextually-possible number; least possible number + n; default n=1
da'ane'e.note: Counts up from {rone'e}, similar to how {da'a} counts down from {ro}

su'ero.note: Not more than all; idiom to indicate that any number (within contextual limits, i.e. {rone'e} {bi'i} {ro}) would satisfy the predicate. {su'o}{no} "at least zero" is also usable in contexts where negative numbers aren't meaningful (e.g. most quantifiers). See {xe'e}, {xo'e}

xe'enai.definition: digit/number: specific referent; modifies quantifier to indicate that there are particular referents that fulfill the predicate
xe'enai.note: ({xe'e} pa prenu) = "any one person / one non-specific person", (xe'enai pa prenu) = "one specific person". See {itca}, {steci}, {su'anai}

baba.definition: time tense: will be going to; (tense/modal).

baca'a.definition: time tense: future actuality; modal aspect.

caca'a.definition: time tense: present actuality; modal aspect.

caku.note: The terminator {ku} is used to close the tense {ca}.

ca ma.definition: sumti question asking for a time/date/event; simultaneous with what?.

cazi.note: Narrows the scope/meaning of "now" to be relatively more immediate (but it still may encompass a small interval that extends into the objective/physical past and/or future).

cazu.note: The interval that is considered to be "now" by the speaker is relatively large(r).

puca'a.definition: time tense: past actuality; modal aspect.

puza.definition: time tense: a medium time before; (tense/modal).

puze'a.definition: time tense: for a medium length interval some time in the past; (tense/modal).

puze'i.definition: time tense: for a short interval some time in the past; (tense/modal).

puze'u.definition: time tense: for a long interval some time in the past; (tense/modal).

puzi.definition: time tense: a short time before; (tense/modal).

puzu.definition: time tense: a long time before; (tense/modal).

puzuvukiku.definition: time-tense discursive: a long time ago and far away; locks frame-of-reference of time and space
puzuvukiku.note: Commonly used similarly to English "once upon a time" in story introductions.

ci'iroi.definition: tense interval modifier: occurs infinite times, eternally; objective tense; defaults as time.

ciroi.definition: tense interval modifier: thrice; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

du'eroi.definition: tense interval modifier: too many times objective tense, defaults as time tense.

fe'enoroi.definition: location tense interval modifier: never in space; objectively quantified tense.

fe'eroroi.definition: location tense interval modifier: always in space; objectively quantified tense.

mo'aroi.definition: tense interval modifier: too few times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

noroi.definition: tense interval modifier: never; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

paroi.definition: tense interval modifier: once; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

piso'iroi.definition: tense interval modifier: often; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

piso'uroi.definition: tense interval modifier: rarely; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

reroi.definition: tense interval modifier: twice; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

roroi.definition: tense interval modifier: always; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

so'eroi.definition: tense interval modifier: usually; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.

so'iroi.definition: tense interval modifier: many times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

so'uroi.definition: tense interval modifier: a few times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.

za'ure'u.definition: again; in addition to the first time; for the "more"-th time

jaica.definition: convert time tense (tagged) place to 1st place; 1st place moves to extra place (fai).

jaigau.definition: makes x_1 the agent of a bridi; old 1st place moves to extra place (fai).

jaivi.definition: convert location tense (tagged) place to 1st place; 1st place moves to extra place (fai).

setese.definition: complicated selbri conversion: exchange x2 and x3

tesete.definition: complicated selbri conversion: exchange x2 and x3

di'inai.definition: tense interval modifier: irregularly/aperiodically; tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

na'onai.definition: tense interval modifier: atypically; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

ru'inai.definition: tense interval modifier: occasional/intermittent/discontinuous; defaults as time tense.

ta'enai.definition: tense interval modifier: non-habitually; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.

ju'aku'i.definition: evidential: although, even though, while, whilst

oi se'i bu'o oi se'i bu'o.definition: oopservative attitudinal: "Oops, I did it again!"

a'icu'i.definition: attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose.

a'inai.definition: attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose.

e'icu'i.definition: attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.

e'inai.definition: attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.

iucu'i.definition: attitudinal: love - no love lost - hatred.

iunai.definition: attitudinal: love - no love lost - hatred.

oiro'e.definition: attitudinal: mental complaint (puzzlement, excess mental work).

uecu'i.definition: attitudinal: surprise - not really surprised - expectation axis.

u'ene'e.note: {u'e} + {ne'e}. Suggested as a third position on the {u'e} scale; this is suggested to avoid having to reassign {u'enai} to {u'e}{cu'i}.

u'ucu'i.definition: attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.

u'unai.definition: attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.

ba'acu'i.definition: evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember.

ba'anai.definition: evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember.

ju'acu'i.definition: evidential: I say without asserting; "supposedly… / allegedly…"
ju'acu'i.note: Used to describe something as others describe it or as convenient, but without asserting that the description is accurate or correct. Something like English "so-called", but without necessarily implying sarcasm ({xo'o}). See {ju'a}, {iacu'i}

ju'anai.definition: evidential: I say without asserting; "supposedly… / allegedly…"
ju'anai.note: Used to describe something as others describe it or as convenient, but without asserting that the description is accurate or correct. Something like English "so-called", but without necessarily implying sarcasm ({xo'o}). See {ju'a}, {iacu'i}

ju'oinai.note: May be used to say you don't know the answer to a question asked to you, or an indirect question ({kau}) you had tagged. See {ju'oi}, {djuno}, {ju'o}

moi'icu'i.note: Used to indicate uncertainty of memory. See {moi'i}, {ju'ocu'i}

su'anai.definition: evidential: I generalize - I particularize; discursive: abstractly - concretely.

bi'unai.definition: discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information.

mu'acu'i.definition: discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.

mu'anai.definition: discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.

ta'onai.definition: discursive: by the way - returning to main point.

va'inai.definition: discursive: in other words - in the same words.

zu'unai.definition: discursive: on the one hand - on the other hand.

ta'unai.definition: discursive: making a tanru - expanding the tanru.

ji'asai.note: Used to indicate an intense additional case or intense additional cases. ex.) lo xagji cribe cu citka lo cinki ku ji'a sai (A hungry bear will eat even insects.)

ku'inai.definition: discursive: in accordance with it; as expected
ku'inai.note: Used in order to draw conclusions in accordance with those statements which were said/uttered previously, as opposed to {ku'i} - 'in contrast'

ga'icu'i.definition: attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of equal rank.

ga'inai.definition: attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of higher rank.

ri'enai.definition: attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint.

xunai.note: Example: {xunai} {do} {djuno} - 'Don't you know?'. Only negates the question rhetorically, and not the expected answer; {go'i}/{ja'a}/{je'u} still means "Yes, I know".

bu'ocu'i.definition: attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

bu'onai.definition: attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.

je'aucu'i.definition: discursive: correcting/corrective/correction - inattentive/uncaring/neutral toward the presence of possible errors - permitting (known/likely/plausible) errordiscursive: correcting/corrective/correction - inattentive/uncaring/neutral toward the presence of possible errors - permitting (known/likely/plausible) error/incompleteness/approximation

je'aunai.definition: discursive: correcting/corrective/correction - inattentive/uncaring/neutral toward the presence of possible errors - permitting (known/likely/plausible) errordiscursive: correcting/corrective/correction - inattentive/uncaring/neutral toward the presence of possible errors - permitting (known/likely/plausible) error/incompleteness/approximation
je'aunai.note: Not quite lying since this construct alerts the audience in good faith to the presence of (known/plausible/likely) errors or "incomplete truths" in the utterance; the plausibility and pertinence of the presence of such errors is subject to the utterer's judgment, opinion, knowledge, philosphy, desire to draw attention to them at that stage in the discussion, belief, etc. - in other words, absolute Truth (such as in an existential sense external to the utterer) does not necessarily result in the utterance of this construct, even if errors may be present. Potentially useful for academic or technical honesty. "Error" may be rendered as "incompleteness of truth" or "approximation" in this context.

zu'ucu'i.note: Used after {zu'u} and {zu'unai}, to refer to a third case not covered by two opposing viewpoints.

pe'ainai.definition: technical meaning; marks a construct as jargon/terminology/technical/precise/exact speech/text
pe'ainai.note: Marks how a construct is to be interpreted/understood.  Similar, but not equivalent, to {pe'anai} and {sa'e}. If a construct should/could be interpreted in a technical sense (such as the word "likelihood" in English in the field of statistics) AND is actually being used in that technical sense (rather than in a layperson sense), it may be marked for technical interpretation by this word. See also: {pe'ai}

pe'anai.definition: literal sense; marks a construct as literal (non-figurative/non-metaphorical/exact) speech/text
pe'anai.note: Literally; one sense of "exactly speaking".  Not to be used as an intensifier (unlike some usages of "literally" in English).

pe'aru'e.definition: weak metaphor marker: indicates that there is some broadening of the concept, typically to include objects of types that are unusual for the defined place structure, but which retains most of the semantic of the word as defined.
pe'aru'e.note: See {pe'a}, {ru'e}, {do'a}. See the Lojban definitions for {dimnu'e} and {tcimi'e} for examples.

ra'i'aucu'i.definition: attitudinal modifier: want this to last - (cu'i) accept this - (nai) want this to end soon
ra'i'aucu'i.note: {ra'i'au} means that the speaker will accept this situation or emotion; From {ranji} + {au}; See also: {ra'i'au}, {ra'i'aunai}

ra'i'aunai.definition: attitudinal modifier: want this to last - (cu'i) accept this - (nai) want this to end soon
ra'i'aunai.note: {ra'i'au} means that the speaker wants this situation or emotion to end soon.; From {ranji} + {au}; See also: {ra'i'au}, {ra'i'aucu'i}

vi ma.definition: sumti question asking for a location: at/near what?.

su'ifa'uvu'u.definition: mekso operator: plus or minus with order important, (((a±b)±c)±...±z)
su'ifa'uvu'u.note: Strictly not "positive or negative" (if order matters, use {ma'ufa'uni'u} instead for that purpose). Subscript {fa'u} when multiple such operators (including "positive or negative" and others) are in use but are applied independently. This word is more useful and more general in mathematics than {su'ijavu'u} is, but is perhaps/arguably less general(ly useful) in Lojban, syntactically speaking, since not all statements have multiple occurrences of {fa'u} that may be linked.

su'ijavu'u.note: Strictly not "positive or negative" (which is {ma'ujani'u} vel sim.). This word is general but could easily be replaced by {su'ijonaivu'u} when the two options are not equivalent (usually when none of the operands are 0). Not preferred in complicated expressions wherein order of operations is important: see {su'ifa'uvu'u} or {su'ifa'u'aivu'u}.

caba'o.definition: time tense: has been, is now in the aftermath of; (tense/modal).

caca'o.definition: time tense: is now/simultaneously, is now in the middle of; (tense/modal).

capu'o.definition: time tense: is going to, is now just about to, is now anticipating; (tense/modal).

fe'eba'o.definition: location event contour tense: perfective in space; beyond the place of ...

fe'eca'o.definition: location event contour tense: continuative in space; throughout the place of ...

fe'eco'a.definition: location event contour tense: initiative in space; on this edge of ...

fe'eco'i.definition: location event contour tense: achievative in space; at the point of ...

fe'emo'u.definition: location event contour tense: completive in space; at the far end of ...

fe'epu'o.definition: location event contour tense: anticipative in space; up to the edge of ...

fe'eza'o.definition: location event contour tense: superfective in space; continuing too far beyond ...

ze'aba.definition: time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the future; (tense/modal).

ze'aca.definition: time tense: a medium time interval spanning the present; (tense/modal).

ze'apu.definition: time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the past; (tense/modal).

la su'oda.definition: name: "Someone", aka "the god of lazy people", used when the speaker is pushing responsibility to someone else unspecified

lu li'u.note: Not: empty word, empty symbol. See also: {zoi'ai'e}.

medomoi.definition: x_1 is yours among x_2 by rule/relationship x_3; x_1 is your x_2 by rule/relationship x_3.

memimoi.definition: x_1 is mine among x_2 by rule/relationship x_3; x_1 is my x_2 by rule/relationship x_3.

zai'e.definition: jargon word indicator; indicates next word is a jargon word
zai'e.note: Jargon words are to have a single, defined, specialized meaning within one particular narrow context (e.g. a game, field of study, or industry), but may also be assigned to other meanings in other contexts. // Proposed rafsi: -zam-. Afterthought variant: {zi'ai}  // Jargonic context, if needed, may be explicated using tanru, including with {bo'ei} / {me} {la}...{ku} clauses, or even defined with a specific meaning using the assigned rafsi e.g. {samyzamsmacu} or {gugyl zei zamgri}

ba'ei.definition: forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next WORD only, even if that word is a construct-indicating cmavo
ba'ei.note: According to CLL 19.11, regular {ba'e} doesnt always emphasize just one word. If it is placed in front of a construct (e.g. {la}), it emphasizes the entire construct. {ba'ei} was designed especially for these cases.

de'i'a.note: {na'arctodetri} modal. ex.) lo ratni jbama cu co'a zvati lo terdi de'i'a li reno (The atomic bomb has been on the Earth since the 20th century.) See also {de'i}; {de'i'e}, {de'i'i}, {de'i'o}, {de'i'u}.

de'i'e.note: {na'ardetri} modal. ex.) la berlin.bitm cu porpi de'i'e li pasobiso (The Berlin Wall was broken in 1989.) See also {de'i}; {de'i'a}, {de'i'i}, {de'i'o}, {de'i'u}.

de'i'i.note: {ma'irdetri} modal. ex.) lo ckule cu de'a gubni de'i'i li bi (The school is closed in August.) See also {de'i}; {de'i'a}, {de'i'e}, {de'i'o}, {de'i'u}.

de'i'o.definition: on the Nth day of the month.
de'i'o.note: {ma'irdeidetri} modal. ex.) mi cliva lo gugde de'i'o li cino (I will leave the country on the 30th.) See also {de'i}; {de'i'a}, {de'i'e}, {de'i'i}, {de'i'u}.

de'i'u.definition: on the Nth day of the week.
de'i'u.note: {jefydeidetri} modal. ex.) lo karni cu co'a gubni de'i'u li ci (The journal is published on Wednesday.) See also {de'i}; {de'i'a}, {de'i'e}, {de'i'i}, {de'i'o}.

gai'i.definition: zgadi/cadga modal; 1st place: with just/expected result ...; should/ought to result in ...
gai'i.note: Not necessarily causal; may be hypothetical.

gu'au.note: equivalent to {fi'o} {gunma}. {gu'au} {je} {fa} {lo} {tadni} {cu} {sruri} {lo} {dinju} is the same as {loi} {tadni} {cu} {sruri} {lo} {dinju}.

ka'ai.definition: kansa modal, 1 place; with .../with a companion ...

ki'oi.definition: se kibzva modal, 1st place: at website/Internet resource...
ki'oi.note: Alternative to the common metaphoric use of {bu'u}. See {kibzva}, {kibystu}, {kibro}

li'i'e.definition: lisri modal, 1st place: in/belonging to/of/from story...
li'i'e.note: Of a character, location, event, etc.; something which exists in the universe of the story.

mu'ai.note: May be {lo} {fatci}, or a universe-of-discourse, real or imagined. See {munje}, {li'i'e}, {xanri}, {da'inri}, {mu'ei}, {enzasti}, {enfasnu}, {va'o}, {ci'e}

te'i.definition: at a point on time axis
te'i.note: {temjudri} modal. See also {de'i} and {ti'u}. ex.) su'o da nuntumdesku te'i li re no pa mu pi'e mu pi'e ci no pi'e re no pi'e re vo noi sinxa lo mentu ku'o te te'i u'y ty cy xi ma'u so (There was an earthquake at 2015-05-30 20:24 UTC+9.) / su'o da nuntumdesku te'i li re vo mu ze pa ze re pi so ze mu te te'i la juli'us (There was an earthquake at 2457172.975 of Julian date.)

ti'u'a.definition: at N o'clock; at the hour N of the day.
ti'u'a.note: {djecacrytcika} modal. ex. lo trene cu cliva ti'u'a li so (The train departs at nine o'clock.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'e}, {ti'u'i}.

ti'u'e.definition: at the minute N of the hour.
ti'u'e.note: {cacryme'utcika} modal. ex. mi ti xrukla ti'u'e li ci no (I will be back at thirty minutes past the hour.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'a}, {ti'u'i}.

ti'u'i.definition: at the second N of the minute.
ti'u'i.note: {metnidytcika} modal. ex. samymri ti mi ti'u'i li vo xa (This was e-mailed to me at 46 seconds past the minute.) See also {ti'u}; {ti'u'a}, {ti'u'e}.

xau.definition: preposition: marks that which the bridi is beneficial to; for the benefit of..., with beneficiary...

be'oi.note: fi'o broda fe'u be'oi ko'a = "fi'o broda be ko'a fe'u"

bei'e.note: Terminated by {be'o}. Until terminated, all following sumti are considered to successively fill the terbri (in order) of the selbri which immediately precedes this word, filling in accord with the order presented (overridden by FA), starting at x2 by default. In a sense, this word delves into the world of the selbri, treating it (temporarily/until terminated) as the selbri of a bridi. (This word reduces the number of {be}'s and {be'o}'s required, as well as reduces the amount of jumping around in an utterance/the thinking required.)

bei'oi.note: fi'o broda fe'u be'oi ko'a bei'oi ko'e = "fi'o broda be ko'a bei ko'e"

boi'oi.definition: preserve formal interpretation of mekso subexpression with no substitutions made
boi'oi.note: In a sense, "converts" an expression from one that has been tampered with in any way to exactly what was uttered in the first place. See: http://mw.lojban.org/papri/Proposal:_distinguishing_digits_from_numbers#Avoiding_the_.22.22D.22_Equals_.229.22.22_hole

ai'y.definition: letteral for i when ending a diphthong (ai, ei, oi), sometimes written as ị

au'y.definition: letteral for u when ending a diphthong (au), sometimes written as ụ

a'y.note: Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{abu}.

bu'o'e.note: Has use in mekso at the least; in this context, it might subsume {xo'e} (but see: {xo'e'o'e}). It also may be useful in spelling, initialisms, etc. If used as a pro-sumti (as other letters are), it means {zo'e} but only for reasonable or previously specified letterals assignments.

e'y.note: Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{ebu}.

iy.definition: letteral for the i semi-vowel, sometimes written as ĭ

i'y.note: Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{ibu}.

iy'y.note: Synonymous with {ybu}. Formed by analogy with {a'y} et al., but {y'y} is already taken.

o'y.note: Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{obu}.

uy.definition: letteral for the u semi-vowel, sometimes written as ŭ

u'y.note: Synonymous with the original CLL definition of .{ubu}.

ui'y.note: Synonynous with .{uibu}. [This word is presently not allowed by morphological and phonotactic constraints.  See: .{a'y}, .{y'i}]

jo'au'o.note: What a "Lojban alphabet" constitutes is determined by culture/context. This shift returns letterals to their contextless default/natural form. (Part of a proposal to restrict definition of {lo'a} to strictly the Latin script.)

ro'au'o.note: (Part of a proposal to restrict definition of {lo'a} to strictly a Lojbanic (default/natural) script.)

bi'ai.definition: Sumtcita indicating that the bridi must be true under the conditions indicated by the tagged sumti.

cau'i.definition: modifier / discursive: elliptical affirmative; "maybe, maybe not"
cau'i.note: Elliptical NAI/CAI. "Maybe yes, maybe no, maybe somewhere in between". Can also modify attitudinals: {uicau'i} = "Maybe I'm happy, maybe I'm sad". See {ju'ocu'i}, {ju'acu'i}, {ju'oinai}, {cau'a}, {cau'e}, {na'i}, {ge'e}

dai'i.definition: attitudinal modifier: supposed emotion - factual emotion
dai'i.note: Used for emotions that are non-factual, for example when talking about hypothetical events. la'a ui dai'i mi ba te dunda lo karce lo mi patfu I will probably be given a car by my dad and I would feel happy about it if that happened.

na'oi.definition: Indicator for moderate or normal attitudinal intensity
na'oi.note: Used to indicate the "default" intensity of attitudinals, the intensity that is implied when for example using a bare "ui" (which is in-between "sai" and "ru'e"). Useful mostly together with pei. Derived from cnano.

ne'e.definition: polar opposite scalar negator; equivalent to {to'e} but in selma'o CAI

pei'a.note: Essentially asks for NAI/CAI. For selbri/sumtcita, the full range of NAI/CAI may be asked for; see http://mw.lojban.org/papri/zipcpi:_scalar_modifiers and {pai'e}. For attitudinals, it is limited to {ru'e}/{na'oi}/{sai}/{cai} or combinations thereof (use {pei} to ask for the full range).

dau'i.note: Specifies an equal intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. See also {mau'i}, {me'ai}, {cu'i}

mau'i.note: Specifies a stronger intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. CAI2 after CAI specifies an absolute intensity - but the CAI2 specifies the relative shift from the regular value. CAI after CAI2 specifies an relative value - and the CAI denotes the relative amount interval size. See also {me'ai}, {dau'i}, {sai}

me'ai.note: Specifies a weaker intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. See also {mau'i}, {dau'i}, {ru'e}

a'oi.note: See also {xai}, {coi}, {co'oi}, {o'ai}. This is an {u'ivla} from "ahoy".

bu'oi.note: A way to shock people analogous to yelling "BOO!" at someone.

co'oi.definition: Combination of {coi} and {co'o}, indicating either greetings or partings according to context.
co'oi.note: The scalar negated forms of this COI are apparently identical to its positive form. cf. {coi}, {co'o}, {rinsa}, {tolrinsa}.

di'ai.note: Used to express well-wishes/curses. See also {dimna}, {zandapma}, {dapma}, {ki'e}, {doi}

doi'oi.definition: vocative: to the attention of, CC, carbon-copy(ing) ...
doi'oi.note: Used in order to alert a non-addressee party to an utterance.

ci'oi.definition: Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into psychomime.
ci'oi.note: Narrower term than {tai'i}. See also {ci'o}, {cinmo}, {sa'ei}, {ki'ai}. Examples in some languages. jpn: そわそわ (sowasowa): restlessly. nep: सुखदुख (sukhadukha): lit. happiness-sorrow; the human condition. eng: "zing", "yoink"

ki'ai.definition: Converts following selbri, cmevla, or zoi-quote into a nonce interjection/attitudinal.

sa'ei.definition: Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into onomatopoeia. (bam! crash! kapow! etc.)

tai'i.definition: Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into phenomime.
tai'i.note: Broader term than {ci'oi} and {sa'ei}. See also {tai}, {tamsmi}, {ki'ai}. Examples in some languages. jpn: しーん (shiin): soundlessly. kor: 슬슬 (seul-seul): gently. nep: हत्तपत्त (hattapatta): immediately.

goi'e.definition: assign sentence or tu'e...tu'u group to sumti
goi'e.note: Works like {cei'e}, but assigns the abstraction involving the associated sentence(s) to a sumti variable. E.g. (goi'e ko'a mi tavla do) assigns (lo su'u mi tavla do) to {ko'a}. Use {lu'e} on the assigned variable to refer to the text itself. See {goi}, {cei}

jo'au.note: {do'u} is the elidable terminator. The morphology and the grammar of cmevla/sumti/selbri following {jo'au} should conform to the version 134 of the page ``BPFK Section: PEG Morphology Algorithm'' on the website lojban.org and the official grammar so that a {jo'au} clause forms a free modifier compatible with every version/dialect of lojban parser: for example, ``jo'au jie bu'' and ``jo'au xy xi xei'' are not meaningful clauses. As a standard usage, {jo'au} clause appears at the very beginning of the whole text, just as the inverse of the usage of {fa'o}. The scope of the meaning of {jo'au} clause spans over the following part until the next {jo'au} clause appears. Optionally, if the first {jo'au} clause appears in the middle of a text, the meaning of it spans from the beginning of the text until the next {jo'au} clause appears. Examples of meaning: jo'au cylyly xi papipa (official yacc and jbofi'e http://www.lojban.org/jboski/ ); jo'au camxes (current peg http://camxes.lojban.org/ ); jo'au iocixes (zasni gerna of la xorxes https://skami2.iocikun.jp/lojban/zasniGerna , http://www.lojban.org/tiki/zasni+gerna ); jo'au zantufa xi nopipapa (zantufa version 0.11 http://guskant.github.io/gerna_cipra/zantufa-0.11.html ); jo'au ilmentufa xi renopavopi'epapapi'erevo (ilmentufa version 2014-11-24 http://mw.lojban.org/extensions/ilmentufa/camxes-exp.html , https://github.com/Ilmen-vodhr/ilmentufa ); jo'au fancylojban (fancylojban http://mw.lojban.org/lmw/fancylojban , http://mw.lojban.org/lmw/ce_ki_tau_jau .); jo'au gadganzu (gadri reinterpretation/reassignment proposal, http://mw.lojban.org/papri/zipcpi:_Yet_another_gadri_article ; no grammar changes, only semantic)

ba'au.definition: tense: refers to future of current space/time reference absolutely

pu'au.definition: tense: refers to past of current space/time reference absolutely
