stagi.definition: x_1 is the edible x_2 portion of plant x_3; x_1 is a vegetable.
stagi.note: Note that fruits and nuts are also vegetables; generally this word will be used for either the general category of edible plants, or for non-fruit vegetables (= {nalrutstagi}).  See also {grute}, {kobli}, {narge}, {sluni}, {spati}, {sunga}, {tamca}.

staku.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of ceramic made by x_2, of composition x_3, in form/shape x_4.
staku.note: Made of baked clay or other non-metallic solid; x_3: composition including x_3, which need not be complete specification.  See also {kliti}.

stani.definition: x_1 is a/the stalk/stem/trunk [body-part] of plant/species x_2; [metaphor: main support].

stapa.definition: x_1 steps/treads on/in surface x_2 using limbs x_3.

stasu.definition: x_1 is a quantity of soup/stew/olla/olio [food] of ingredients including x_2.
stasu.note: x_2 is in x_1, an ingredient/part/component of x_1.  See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {salta}, {sanso}.

stati.definition: x_1 has a talent/aptitude/innate skill for doing/being x_2.

steci.definition: x_1 (ka) is specific/particular/specialized/[special]/a defining property of x_2 among x_3 (set).
steci.note: [x_2 are members/individuals of a subset of x_3; object whose association is specific/defining of a subset or individuals (= {tecra'a}, also cf. cmavo list {po'e}, [x_2 is also special to x_1]); also: especially/strongly/specifically associated]; (x_3 is completely specified set)]; See also {srana}, se {ponse}, {ckini}, {tcila}, {tutra}.

stedu.definition: x_1 is a/the head [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: uppermost portion].

stela.definition: x_1 is a lock/seal of/on/for sealing x_2 with/by locking mechanism x_3.

stero.definition: x_1 is x_2 steradian(s) [metric unit] in solid angle (default is 1) by standard x_3.

stici.definition: x_1 is to the west/western side of x_2 according to frame of reference x_3.

stidi.definition: x_1 (agent) suggests/proposes idea/action x_2 to audience x_3; x_1 (event) inspires x_2 in/among x_3.
stidi.note: Event which inspires/suggests/is suggestive (= {faurti'i}, {sidyfau}).  See also cmavo list {ti'i}, {tcica}, {xlura}.

stika.definition: x_1 (event) adjusts/regulates/changes x_2 (ka/ni) in amount/degree x_3.
stika.note: Non-resultative, causal change; agentive adjust (= {tikygau}, {tikyzu'e}).  See also {cenba} which need not be causal, {galfi} which is causal and resultative, {binxo} which need not be causal but is resultative, {zasni}, {stodi}.

stizu.definition: x_1 is a chair/stool/seat/bench, a piece or portion of a piece of furniture intended for sitting.

stodi.definition: x_1 is constant/invariant/unchanging in property x_2 (ka) in response to stimulus/conditions x_3.

stuna.definition: x_1 is to the east/eastern side of x_2 according to frame of reference x_3.

stura.definition: x_1 is a structure/arrangement/organization of x_2 [set/system/complexity].
stura.note: (x_2, if a set, is completely specified); See also {ganzu}, {morna}, {ciste}, {lujvo}, {greku}, {gerna}.

stuzi.definition: x_1 is an inherent/inalienable site/place/position/situation/spot/location of x_2 (object/event).
stuzi.note: Generally used for normally stationary objects/events, to give their 'permanent' location.  See also cmavo list {tu'i}, {jmive}, {diklo}, {zvati}, {tcini}, {xabju}, {jibni}, {judri}, {lamji}, {mokca}, {stali}.

sucta.definition: x_1 (si'o) is abstracted/generalized/idealized from x_2 [something concrete] by rules x_3.

sudga.definition: x_1 is dry of liquid x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is arid.

sufti.definition: x_1 is a/the hoof [body-part] of x_2.

suksa.definition: x_1 (event/state) is sudden/sharply changes at stage/point x_2 in process/property/function x_3.

sumji.definition: x_1 is a mathematical sum/result/total of x_2 plus/increased by x_3.

sumne.definition: x_1 (experiencer) smells/scents (transitive verb) x_2; x_2 smells/has odor/scent to observer x_1.

sumti.definition: x_1 is a/the argument of predicate/function x_2 filling place x_3 (kind/number).
sumti.note: (x_1 and x_2 are text); See also {bridi}, {darlu}, {gismu}.

sunga.definition: x_1 is a quantity of garlic [bulb] of species/strain x_2.

sunla.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/made from/consists of wool [tight curly hair] from animal/species/source x_2.

surla.definition: x_1 relaxes/rests/is at ease in/by doing/being x_2 (activity).

sutra.definition: x_1 is fast/swift/quick/hastes/rapid at doing/being/bringing about x_2 (event/state).

tabno.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of carbon/graphite/[diamond]/charcoal; x_1 is organic.

tabra.definition: x_1 is a horn/trumpet/trombone/bugle [brass-wind/lip-reed musical instrument].

tadji.definition: x_1 [process] is a method/technique/approach/means for doing x_2 (event) under conditions x_3.
tadji.note: Also practice/way/mode; style/manner/conduct (= {tratadji}); pattern (= {montadji}, {tadjymo'a}, or {platadji}, {tadjypla}).  See also {ciste}, {pruce}, {zukte}, {pluta}, cmavo list {ta'i}.

tadni.definition: x_1 studies/is a student of x_2; x_1 is a scholar; (adjective:) x_1 is scholarly.

tagji.definition: x_1 is snug/tight on x_2 in dimension/direction x_3 at locus x_4.

talsa.definition: x_1 (person) challenges x_2 at/in property x_3.

tamca.definition: x_1 is a tomato [fruit/vegetable/plant] of species/strain x_2.

tamji.definition: x_1 is a/the thumb/big toe [body-part] on limb x_2 of x_3; [metaphor based on relative shape].
tamji.note: Thumb (specifically the hand = {xantamji}), big toe (= {jmatamji}).  See also {degji}, {tance}, {xance}, {jamfu}.

tamne.definition: x_1 is cousin to x_2 by bond/tie x_3; [non-immediate family member, default same generation].
tamne.note: Probably preferred for metaphorical siblings (over bruna). See also {dzena}, {famti}, {mensi}, {bruna}, {tunba}.

tanbo.definition: x_1 is a board/plank [3-dimensional long flat rectangle] of material x_2.

tance.definition: x_1 is a/the tongue [body-part] of x_2; (metaphor: similar to nazbi, tamji, degji).

tanjo.definition: x_1 is the trigonometric tangent of angle/arctangent x_2.

tanko.definition: x_1 is a quantity of tobacco [leaf] of species/strain x_2.

tanru.definition: x_1 is a binary metaphor formed with x_2 modifying x_3, giving meaning x_4 in usage/instance x_5.
tanru.note: (x_2 and x_3 are both text or both si'o concept) See also {gismu}, {smuni}.

tansi.definition: x_1 is a pan/basin/tub/sink, a shallow container for contents x_2, of material/properties x_3.
tansi.note: Also bowl.  See also {baktu}, {palne}, {palta}, {patxu}, {kabri} for a bowl that is normally lifted for use, {botpi}.

tanxe.definition: x_1 is a box/carton/trunk/crate for contents x_2, and made of material x_3.

tapla.definition: x_1 is a tile/cake [shape/form] of material x_2, shape x_3, thickness x_4.
tapla.note: A tile is a 3-dimensional object, relatively uniform and significant in the 3rd dimension, but thin enough that its shape in the the other two dimensions is a significant feature; 'city block' is conceptually a tile; polygon (= {taplytai} or {kardytai} - shaped like an approximately-2-dimensional block, {lijyclupa} - a loop composed of lines).  (cf. {bliku}, {kubli}, {matci}; {karda}, for which the 3rd dimension is insignificant, {bliku}, {kurfa}, {matci}, {plita}, {tarmi})

tarbi.definition: x_1 is an embryo/zygote/fetus/fertilized egg with mother x_2, and father x_3.

tarci.definition: x_1 is a star/sun with stellar properties x_2.

tarla.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of tar/asphalt from source x_2.

tarmi.definition: x_1 [ideal] is the conceptual shape/form of object/abstraction/manifestation x_2 (object/abstract).
tarmi.note: Also pattern; x_1 is the mathematical or theoretical ideal form, while x_2 is an object/event manifesting that form; e.g. circular/circle-shaped (= {cukseltai}) vs. circle (={cuktai}, while {cukla} alone is ambiguous); model (= {ci'ersaptai}, {saptai}, {ci'ersmitai}, {smitai}).  See alse {nejni}, te {marji} for physical shape, {tapla}, {bliku}, {kubli}, {kurfa}, {cukla}, {mapti}, {morna}, {sarlu}.

tarti.definition: x_1 behaves/conducts oneself as/in-manner x_2 (event/property) under conditions x_3.
tarti.note: Also (adjective:) x_1 is behavioral.  See also {cnano}, {frati}, {tcaci}, {cilce}, {jikca}, {marde}.

taske.definition: x_1 thirsts for x_2; x_1 needs/wants drink/fluid/lubrication x_2.

tatpi.definition: x_1 is tired/fatigued by effort/situation x_2 (event); x_1 needs/wants rest.

tatru.definition: x_1 is a/the breast/mammary/teat [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: projection providing liquid].

tavla.definition: x_1 talks/speaks to x_2 about subject x_3 in language x_4.
tavla.note: Not limited to vocal speech, but this is implied by the x_4 without context of some other medium of conversation (use {cusku}, {casnu}, {skicu}, {ciksi} for weaker implication of vocal communication); converse/discuss/chat (= {simta'a}, {simsku}, {vricysimta'a} for a conversation not clearly delimited by subject).  See also {bacru}, {cusku} for actual expression, {casnu}, {darlu}, {skicu}, {ciksi}, {bangu}.

taxfu.definition: x_1 is dress/a garment/clothing for wearing by x_2 (gender/species/body part) serving purpose x_3.
taxfu.note: Also: x_2 can wear/is wearing x_1; refers to something intended for use as a garment, not merely something that happens to be worn at some time (which need not be true for dasni).  See also {creka}, {cutci}, {daski}, {dasni}, {gluta}, {kosta}, {mapku}, {palku}, {pastu}, {skaci}, {smoka}, {lunbe}.

tcaci.definition: x_1 is a custom/habit/[ritual/rut] of x_2 under conditions x_3.
tcaci.note: Also: x_1 is customary/usual/the practice.  See also {fadni}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {jinzi}, {ckaji}, {cnano}, {tarti}, {ritli}, {javni}, {zekri}.

tcadu.definition: x_1 is a town/city of metropolitan area x_2, in political unit x_3, serving hinterland/region x_4.
tcadu.note: Also (adjective:) x_1 is urban.  See also {jarbu}, {nurma}, {cecmu}.

tcana.definition: x_1 is a station/node of/in/on transport/communication/distribution system/network x_2.
tcana.note: x_2 may be represented by massed vehicles of system.  See also {dargu}, {litru}, {pluta}, {trene}, {ciste}, ve {mrilu}, {tivni}, {cradi}, ve {benji}, {fonxa}, {dikca}, {fatri}.

tcati.definition: x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of tea brewed from leaves x_2.

tcena.definition: x_1 stretches/extends to range x_2 [interval/extent] in dimension x_3 from relaxed range x_4.

tcica.note: Agentive deception (= {ticygau}, {ticyzu'e}); x_3 could be an action or a belief on the part of x_2; harmful intent or result is not implied (= {malticyzu'e} for such harmful intent); self deception (= {sezytcica}); deceive/trick into misguided action (= {ticyxlu}); misguided belief (= {tickri}); fib/lie/tell an untruth/lie/fib (= {ticysku}, {jifsku}), white lie (= {zanticysku}).  See also {stace}, {xlura}, {stidi}, {kajde}.

tcidu.definition: x_1 [agent] reads x_2 [text] from surface/document/reading material x_3; x_1 is a reader.

tcika.definition: x_1 [hours, minutes, seconds] is the time/hour of state/event x_2 on day x_3 at location x_4.
tcika.note: Also o'clock, time-of-day.  (time units in x_1 are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {ti'u}, {cacra}, {cerni}, {detri}, {donri}, {djedi}, {junla}, {nicte}, {mentu}, {snidu}, {temci}, {vanci}, {dirba}, {mokca}.

tcila.definition: x_1 is a detail/feature/particular of x_2.

tcima.definition: x_1 is weather at place/region x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is meteorological.

tcini.definition: x_1 [state/property] is a situation/condition/state/position/are conditions/circumstances of x_2.
tcini.note: Characteristics or environment of an object/event/process stage or state that are typically/potentially only temporary.  See also {stuzi}, {zvati}, {vanbi}, ve {pruce}, {ckaji}, {zasni}.

tcita.definition: x_1 is a label/tag of x_2 showing information x_3.

temci.definition: x_1 is the time-duration/interval/period/[elapsed time] from time/event x_2 to time/event x_3.

tenfa.definition: x_1 is the exponential result of base x_2 to power/exponent x_3.

tengu.definition: x_1 (property-ka) is a texture of x_2.

terdi.definition: x_1 is the Earth/the home planet of race x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is terrestrial/earthbound.
terdi.note: (cf. {lunra}, {plini}, {solri}, {kensa}, {tsani}; {dertu} for ground, dirt, except when used to express physical relative frame of reference E.g. on the ground, the ground beneath us.  {tsani})

terpa.definition: x_1 fears x_2; x_1 is afraid/scared/frightened by/fearful of x_2 (event/tu'a object).
terpa.note: Also: x_1 feels terror about x_2; x_2 is fearsome/fearful/frightening/scary to x_1 (= {selte'a} to reorder places).  See also {snura}, {xalni}, {xanka}, {virnu}.

terto.definition: x_1 is a trillion [10^12] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

tigni.definition: x_1 performs x_2 [performance] for/before audience x_3.

tikpa.definition: x_1 kicks [hits with x_1's foot/feet x_4] x_2 in/at locus x_3, using x_1's foot/feet x_4.

tilju.definition: x_1 is heavy/weighty in mass/weight by standard x_2.

tinbe.definition: x_1 obeys/follows the command/rule x_2 made by x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is obedient.

tinci.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of tin (Sn); [metaphor: cheap or base metal].

tinsa.definition: x_1 is stiff/rigid/inflexible/resistant in direction x_2 against force x_3 under conditions x_4.
tinsa.note: Also sometimes: firm, hard;  not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity.  See also {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

tirna.definition: x_1 hears x_2 against background/noise x_3; x_2 is audible; (adjective:) x_1 is aural.

tirse.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of iron (Fe); [metaphor: strong, durable, tarnishing].
tirse.note: Also (adjective:) x_1 is ferric/ferrous.  See also {jinme}, {gasta}, {molki}.

tirxu.definition: x_1 is a tiger/leopard/jaguar/[tigress] of species/breed x_2 with coat markings x_3.
tirxu.note: Due to the unusual grouping of concepts in this definition, {tigra} is favored for "tiger". /A great cat noted/recognized by its markings, metaphorically: stripes, tiger markings.  See also {mlatu}.

tisna.definition: x_1 (object) fills/becomes stuffed [up]/inflates/blows up with material x_2; x_2 pours into x_1.
tisna.note: Implies some relative degree of fullness will result; agentive filling (= {tisyse'a}, {tisygau}, {tisyzu'e}); inflate/become inflated/blow up (= {gacytisna}, agentive {gacyse'a}); pour into (= {liktisna}, agentive {likse'a}).  See also {culno}, {kunti}, {rinci}, {setca}.

titla.definition: x_1 is sweet/sugary/saccharine to observer x_2.

tivni.definition: x_1 broadcasts/televises programming x_2 via medium/channel x_3 to television receiver x_4.
tivni.note: Also x_1 is a broadcaster; x_2 programming (mass), program/show (ind.).  See also {cradi}, {skina}, {vidni}, {benji}, {tcana}.

tixnu.definition: x_1 is a daughter of mother/father/parents x_2; [not necessarily biological].

toknu.definition: x_1 is an oven [enclosure that heats its contents] for baking/heating/drying x_2.

toldi.definition: x_1 is a butterfly/moth of species/breed x_2.

tonga.definition: x_1 is a tone/note of frequency/pitch x_2 from source x_3.

tordu.definition: x_1 is short in dimension/direction x_2 (default longest dimension) by measurement standard x_3.

traji.definition: x_1 is superlative in property x_2 (ka), the x_3 extreme (ka; default ka zmadu) among set/range x_4.
traji.note: Also: x_1 is x_3-est/utmost in x_2 among x_4; x_1 is the x_3 end of x_4; x_1 is extreme; x_1 is simply x_3.  (cf. cmavo list {rai}, {jimte}, {milxe}, {mutce}, note contrast with milxe and mutce rather than with mleca and zmadu, which are values for x_3, {banli}, {curve}, {fanmo}, {krasi}, {manfo}, {prane})

trano.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of nitrogen/ammonia/nitrates.

trati.definition: x_1 is taut/tense/strained tight in direction x_2.

trene.definition: x_1 is a train [vehicle] of cars/units x_2 (mass) for rails/system/railroad x_3, propelled by x_4.
trene.note: A railed vehicle or train of vehicles; also subway ({tu'unre'e}), metro, trolley, tramway (= {lajre'e}), roller coaster; monorail (= {dadre'e}); cable car, sky car, ski lift (= {cildadre'e}).  See also {tcana}.

tricu.definition: x_1 is a tree of species/cultivar x_2.

trina.definition: x_1 attracts/appeals to/lures x_2 (person/event) with property/quality x_3 (ka).
trina.note: Also: x_1 is alluring to x_2.  See also {djica}, {nelci}, {rigni}, {xlura}, {maksi}.

trixe.definition: x_1 is posterior/behind/back/in the rear of x_2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x_3.
trixe.note: Also: x_3 is the standard of orientation for x_2; spine (= {rixybo'u}, {rixybo'ukamju}).  See also {crane}, {rebla}, {mlana}, {pritu}, {zunle}.

troci.definition: x_1 tries/attempts/makes an effort to do/attain x_2 (event/state/property) by actions/method x_3.

tsali.definition: x_1 is strong/powerful/[tough] in property/quality x_2 (ka) by standard x_3.

tsani.definition: x_1 is an expanse of sky/the heavens at place x_2; [celestial].

tsapi.definition: x_1 is a seasoning/condiment/spice causing flavor/effect x_2 (event/property).
tsapi.note: Also: x_1 flavors x_2 (tu'a).  See also {vrusi}.

tsiju.definition: x_1(s) is/are (a) seed(s)/spore(s) [body-part] of organism x_2 for producing offspring x_3.
tsiju.note: Also germ cell; implies actual potential for self-development; seeds generally contain embryo and food, and hence would include a fertilized egg. See also {tarbi}, {dembi}, {grute}, {jbari}, {sombo}, {spati}, {sovda}.

tsina.definition: x_1 is a stage/platform/dais/[scaffold] at/in x_2 supporting x_3, made of material x_4.

tubnu.definition: x_1 is a length of tubing/pipe/hollow cylinder [shape/form] of material x_2, hollow of material x_3.
tubnu.note: Also tube, sleeve, leg, hose, (adjective:) tubular.  See also {kevna}, {canlu}.

tugni.definition: x_1 [person] agrees with person(s)/position/side x_2 that x_3 (du'u) is true about matter x_4.

tujli.definition: x_1 is a tulip (defined by flower shape) of species/strain x_2.

tumla.definition: x_1 is a parcel/expanse of land at location x_2; x_1 is terrain.

tunba.definition: x_1 is a sibling of x_2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x_3.

tunka.definition: x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of copper (Cu); [metaphor: reddish, electrical conductor].

tunlo.note: x_1 swallows down food/drink. x_2 (= {tulpinxe}, {tulcti}, {ctitu'o} (the latter two are more general - for food or beverage); swallow/engulf (= {galxycti}, {galxynerbi'o}, {galxygre}.  See also {citka}, {pinxe}, {galxe}.

tuple.definition: x_1 is a/the leg [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: supporting branch].

turni.definition: x_1 governs/rules/is ruler/governor/sovereign/reigns over people/territory/domain/subjects x_2.
turni.note: x_2 need not be complete specification of set of governed; reign/rule (= {noltru}); king/queen/sovereign (= {nolraitru}); pure democracy (= {roltrusi'o}), representative democracy (= {rolka'itrusi'o}), viceroy (= {ka'itru}), pure communism (= {kaurpo'esi'o}), board of directors/trustees, steering committee (= {trukamni}); government (= {trugunma}, {trugri} (emphasizing the components), {truci'e} (emphasizing the organization)).  See also {catni}, {minde}, {tutra}, {jecta}, {gugde}, {ponse}, {jitro}.

tutci.definition: x_1 is a tool/utensil/resource/instrument/implement used for doing x_2; [form determines function].
tutci.note: (cf. {cabra}, {minji}, se {pilno}, {zukte}, {sazri}, basic tool types: {salpo}, {pulni}, {cfine}, {klupe}, {jendu}, {xislu}, {vraga}; utensils: {forca}, {smuci}, {dakfu}; specifics: {balre}, {mruli}, {cinza}, {garna}, {pijne}, {pambe}, {canpa}, {pilno}, {vraga})

tutra.definition: x_1 is territory/domain/space of/belonging to/controlled by x_2.

vacri.definition: x_1 is a quantity of air/normally-gaseous atmosphere of planet x_2, of composition including x_3.

vajni.definition: x_1 (object/event) is important/significant to x_2 (person/event) in aspect/for reason x_3 (nu/ka).
vajni.note: Also: x_1 matters to x_2 in aspect/respect x_3.  See also {banli}, {ralju}, {vamji}, {dirba}, {kargu}, {pajni}.

valsi.definition: x_1 is a word meaning/causing x_2 in language x_3; (adjective: x_1 is lexical/verbal).

vamji.definition: x_1 (ni) is the equivalent value/worth of x_2 [item(s) of value] to x_3 for use/appreciation x_4.
vamji.note: Also: x_2 is worth x_1 to x_3; (for x_2 person:) x_2 merits (one sense), (adjective:) x_2 is worthy (= selva'i for reordered places); merit reward (= {nemselva'i}); receive merited reward (= {vamselne'u}); x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyva'i}, {posyselva'i} for unambiguous semantics).  (cf. {jdima}, {jerna}, {vecnu}, {dirba}, {janta}, {kargu}, {pleji}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {vajni})

vamtu.definition: x_1 vomits/regurgitates x_2; x_1 throws x_2 up; [violent] digestive expulsion.

vanbi.definition: x_1 (ind./mass) is part of an environment/surroundings/context/ambience of x_2.
vanbi.note: (adjective:) x_1 is ambient.  See also cmavo list {va'o}, {sruri}, {jibni}, {jbini}, {ferti}, {tcini}.

vanci.definition: x_1 is an evening [from end-of-work until sleep typical for locale] of day x_2 at location x_3.
vanci.note: This evening (= {cabvanci}); tomorrow evening (= {bavlamvanci}); yesterday evening (= {prulamvanci}).  See also {cerni}, {murse}, {tcika}.

vanju.definition: x_1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of wine from fruit/grapes x_2.

vasru.definition: x_1 contains/holds/encloses/includes contents x_2 within; x_1 is a vessel containing x_2.
vasru.note: [also accommodates, container; containment need not be total; x_2 is Contained. in x_1 (= selvau for reordered places)]; See also {bartu}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {botpi}, {lanka}.

vasxu.note: (though used to make the Lojban word, clue word vascular is erroneous, actually pertaining to the circulatory system that carries the respired oxygen to the tissues); See also {fepri}, {kijno}, {vacri}.

vecnu.definition: x_1 [seller] sells/vends x_2 [goods/service/commodity] to buyer x_3 for amount/cost/expense x_4.
vecnu.note: x_1 is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; x_3 buys x_2 from x_1 (= {terve'u} for reordered terms); x_4 is the price of x_2 to x_3 (= {velve'u} for reordered terms); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); x_2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyve'u}, {posyselve'u} for unambiguous semantics).  (cf. {canja}, {dunda}, {janta}, {pleji}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {zarci}, {vamji}, {jdima}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {fepni}, {friti}, {jerna}, {rupnu})

venfu.definition: x_1 takes revenge on/retaliates against x_2 (person) for wrong x_3 (nu) with vengeance x_4 (nu).
venfu.note: Also avenge; (adjective:) x_1 is vengeful.  See also {sfasa}, {cnemu}.

vensa.definition: x_1 is spring/springtime [warming season] of year x_2 at location x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is vernal.

verba.definition: x_1 is a child/kid/juvenile [a young person] of age x_2, immature by standard x_3.
verba.note: Not necessarily human.  See also {cifnu}, {makcu}, {citno}, {panzi}, {nanla}, {nixli}, se {rirni}, {bersa}.

vibna.definition: x_1 is a/the vagina [body-part] of x_2.

vidni.definition: x_1 is a video monitor/CRT/screen [machine] serving function x_2.

vidru.definition: x_1 is a virus of species/breed/defining property x_2 capable of infecting [at] x_3.

vikmi.definition: x_1 [body] excretes waste x_2 from source x_3 via means/route x_4.

viknu.definition: x_1 is thick/viscous under conditions x_2.

vimcu.definition: x_1 removes/subtracts/deducts/takes away x_2 from x_3 with/leaving result/remnant/remainder x_4.
vimcu.note: Also appropriates, confiscates; alienation is inherent.  See also {lebna}, {muvdu}, {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.

vindu.definition: x_1 is poisonous/venomous/toxic/a toxin to x_2.

vinji.definition: x_1 is an airplane/aircraft [flying vehicle] for carrying passengers/cargo x_2, propelled by x_3.

vipsi.definition: x_1 is a deputy/vice/subordinate in aspect [or organization principle] x_2 (ka) to principal x_3.

virnu.definition: x_1 is brave/valiant/courageous in activity x_2 (event) by standard x_3.

viska.definition: x_1 sees/views/perceives visually x_2 under conditions x_3.
viska.note: Also (adjective:) x_1 is visual; x_3 can include ambient lighting, background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that English "see" often means "look" or a more generic "observe", or even "understand, know".  See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno}, {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

vitci.definition: x_1 is irregular/occasional/intermittent in property/action/aspect x_2.

vitke.definition: x_1 is a guest/visitor of x_2 at place/event x_3; x_1 visits x_2/x_3.

vitno.definition: x_1 is permanent/lasting/[eternal] in property x_2 (ka) by standard x_3 [time-span/expectant one].

vlagi.definition: x_1 is a/the vulva [body-part] of x_2.

vlile.definition: x_1 is an event/state/act of violence.

vlina.definition: x_1 is a logical alternation/disjunction, stating that x_2 (du'u) and/or x_3 (du'u) is/are true.

vlipa.definition: x_1 has the power to bring about x_2 under conditions x_3; x_1 is powerful in aspect x_2 under x_3.
vlipa.note: Also potent, has control/mastery.  See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.

vofli.definition: x_1 flies [in air/atmosphere] using lifting/propulsion means x_2.

voksa.definition: x_1 is a voice/speech sound of individual x_2.

vorme.definition: x_1 is a doorway/gateway/access way between x_2 and x_3 of structure x_4.
vorme.note: Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= {vrogai}/{vrobi'u}/{vrozu'itci}).  See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.

vraga.definition: x_1 is a lever [tool] [of apparatus] for doing x_2 [function/action], with fulcrum x_3 and arm x_4.

vreji.definition: x_1 is a record of x_2 (data/facts/du'u) about x_3 (object/event) preserved in medium x_4.

vreta.definition: x_1 lies/rests/reclines/reposes on x_2; x_1 is reclining/recumbent/lying on x_2.

vrici.definition: x_1 (set/mass/ind.) is miscellaneous/various/assorted in property x_2 (ka).

vrude.definition: x_1 is virtuous/saintly/[fine/moral/nice/holy/morally good] by standard x_2.
vrude.note: Holy/saintly (= {cesyvu'e}).  Virtue the attribute is "ka vrude".  See also {palci}, {xamgu}, {marde}, {zabna}.

vrusi.definition: x_1 (ka) is a taste/flavor of/emitted by x_2; x_2 tastes of/like x_1.
vrusi.note: Also: x_2 tastes of seasoning x_1, x_1 is a seasoned flavor of x_2 (= {tsapyvu'i}); vrusi may overlap the senses of taste and smell, since the latter is a significant component of taste.  See also {kukte}, {tsapi}, {cpina}, {panci}.

vukro.definition: x_1 reflects Ukrainian language/culture/nationality in aspect x_2.

xabju.definition: x_1 dwells/lives/resides/abides at/inhabits/is a resident of location/habitat/nest/home/abode x_2.

xadba.definition: x_1 is exactly/approximately half/semi-/demi-/hemi- of x_2 by standard x_3.

xadni.definition: x_1 is a/the body/corpus/corpse of x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is corporal/corporeal.

xagji.definition: x_1 hungers for x_2; x_1 needs/wants food/fuel x_2.

xagri.definition: x_1 is a oboe/clarinet/saxophone [reed musical instrument] with reed x_2.

xajmi.definition: x_1 is funny/comical to x_2 in property/aspect x_3 (nu/ka); x_3 is what is funny about x_1 to x_2.
xajmi.note: Also: x_1 is a comedian (= {xampre}, {xamseljibri} for a professional comedian).  (x_1 can be a person/object or an abstraction; be careful about possible sumti-raising); See also {bebna}, {cisma}, {cmila}, {fenki}, {zdile}.

xalbo.definition: x_1 uses levity/is non-serious/frivolous about x_2 (abstraction).

xalka.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of alcohol of type x_2 from source/process x_3.

xalni.definition: x_1 (person) is panicked by crisis x_2 (event/state).

xamgu.definition: x_1 (object/event) is good/beneficial/nice/[acceptable] for x_2 by standard x_3.

xampo.definition: x_1 is x_2 ampere(s) [metric unit] in current (default is 1) by standard x_3.

xamsi.definition: x_1 is a sea/ocean/gulf/[atmosphere] of planet x_2, of fluid x_3; (adjective:) x_1 is marine.

xance.definition: x_1 is a/the hand [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: manipulating tool, waldo].

xanka.definition: x_1 is nervous/anxious about x_2 (abstraction) under conditions x_3.

xanri.definition: x_1 [concept] exists in the imagination of/is imagined by/is imaginary to x_2.
xanri.note: Also (adjective:) x_1 is mental (one sense), x_1 is unreal (one sense); in spite of the synonym, note that x_1 is imaginary does not imply that it doesn't exist in the real world; the definition is crafted so that one can talk about imaginary things without claiming that they thereby don't exist.  See also {fatci}, {senva}, {sucta}, {zasti}, {cfika}, {dacti}, {menli}, {sidbo}.

xanto.definition: x_1 is an elephant of species/breed x_2.

xarci.definition: x_1 is a weapon/arms for use against x_2 by x_3.

xarju.definition: x_1 is a pig/hog/swine/[boar] [pork/ham/bacon-producer] of species/breed x_2.
xarju.note: Sow (= {fetxarju}), boar (= {nakyxarju}), pork (= {xajre'u}), piglet (= {citxarju}).  See also {mabru}, {cange}.

xarnu.definition: x_1 is stubborn/willfully opposing/resisting x_2 about x_3 (event/state).
xarnu.note: x_2 may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the essence is willful resistance.  See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli}, {fapro}.

xasli.definition: x_1 is a donkey/jackass of species/breed x_2.

xasne.definition: x_1 is a/the sweat/perspiration from body x_2, excreted by gland(s)/organs x_3.

xatra.definition: x_1 is a letter/missive/[note] to intended audience x_2 from author/originator x_3 with content x_4.
xatra.note: (cf. {notci}, which has places in a different order; the emphasis in xatra is on the communication between author and recipient, and not the content, which in a letter may not easily be categorized to a 'subject'; {ciska}, {mrilu}, {papri})

xatsi.definition: x_1 is 10^{-18} of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

xazdo.definition: x_1 reflects Asiatic culture/nationality/geography in aspect x_2.

xebni.definition: x_1 hates/despises x_2 (object/abstraction); x_1 is full of hate for x_2; x_2 is odious to x_1.
xebni.note: x_1 is hateful (one sense); x_2 is hateful (different sense).  See also {djica}, {nitcu}, {rigni}, {prami}, {nelci}.

xebro.definition: x_1 reflects Hebrew/Jewish/Israeli culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.

xecto.definition: x_1 is a hundred [100; 10^2] of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

xedja.definition: x_1 is a/the jaw [body-part] of x_2.

xelso.definition: x_1 reflects Greek/Hellenic culture/nationality/language in aspect x_2.

xendo.definition: x_1 (person) is kind to x_2 in actions/behavior x_3.

xenru.definition: x_1 regrets/rues (abstraction) x_2; x_1 is regretful/rueful/sorry/[remorseful] about x_2.
xenru.note: Also: x_1 feels remorse about x_2 (= {zugyxe'u}).  (cf. cmavo list {u'u}, {zungi})

xexso.definition: x_1 is 10^18 of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

xindo.definition: x_1 reflects Hindi language/culture/religion in aspect x_2.
xindo.note: Defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be implied (when constrained by {xingu'e}).  See also {srito}, {xurdo}, {bengo}.

xinmo.definition: x_1 is a quantity of ink of color/pigment x_2 used by writing device x_3.

xirma.definition: x_1 is a horse/equine/[colt/mare/stallion/pony] of species/breed x_2.

xislu.definition: x_1 is a wheel [tool] of device/vehicle x_2, made of materials/having properties x_3.

xispo.definition: x_1 reflects Hispano-American culture/nationalities in aspect x_2.
xispo.note: Refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana.  See also {merko}, {mexno}, {spano}, {ketco}, {bemro}, {gento}.

xlali.definition: x_1 is bad for x_2 by standard x_3; x_1 is poor/unacceptable to x_2.
xlali.note: Be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: x_1 does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}).  See also {palci}, {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.

xlura.definition: x_1 (agent) influences/lures/tempts x_2 into action/state x_3 by influence/threat/lure x_4.
xlura.note: Also impresses; x_4 is alluring (= {trivelxlu} for place reordering); x_3 may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state).  (x_3 and x_4 are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti}, {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde}, {maksi}.

xotli.definition: x_1 is a hotel/inn/hostel at location x_2 operated by x_3.

xrabo.definition: x_1 reflects Arabic-speaking culture/nationality in aspect x_2.

xrani.definition: x_1 (event) injures/harms/damages victim x_2 in property x_3 (ka) resulting in injury x_4 (state).

xriso.definition: x_1 pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect x_2.

xruba.definition: x_1 is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain x_2.

xruki.definition: x_1 is a turkey [food/bird] of species/breed x_2.

xrula.definition: x_1 is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species x_2; (adjective:) x_1 is floral.

xruti.definition: x_1 (agent) returns x_2 to origin/earlier state x_3 from x_4; x_1 moves/gives x_2 back to x_3 from x_4.
xruti.note: x_2 goes back/reverts/Retreats. to x_3 (= {se'ixru} for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); (x_3 may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with {krefu} or {rapli} and a causative like {rinka}/{rikygau}).  See also {benji}, {krefu}, {rapli}, {rinka}.

xukmi.definition: x_1 is an instance of substance/chemical/drug x_2 (individual or mass) with purity x_3.

xurdo.definition: x_1 reflects Urdu language/culture/nationality in aspect x_2.

xusra.definition: x_1 (agent) asserts/claims/declares x_2 (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority].
xusra.note: Also: x_1 states/says that/affirms/purports to know that x_2.  (cf. {natfe} which is propositional and non-agentive, {nupre})

zabna.definition: x_1 is favorable/great/superb/fabulous/dandy/outstanding/swell/admirable/nice/commendable/delightful/desirable/enjoyable/laudable/likable/lovable/wonderful/praiseworthy/high-quality/cool in property x_2 by standard x_3; x_1 rocks in aspect x_2 according to x_3

zajba.definition: x_1 is a gymnast at/performs gymnastics feat x_2.

zalvi.definition: x_1 [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes x_2 into powder x_3.
zalvi.note: May need mosra tanru.  See also {daspo}, {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.

zanru.definition: x_1 approves of/gives favor to plan/action x_2 (object/event).

zarci.definition: x_1 is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) x_2, operated by/with participants x_3.
zarci.note: Also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); x_3 may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators.  See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju}, {banxa}.

zargu.definition: x_1 is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of x_2; [metaphor: rounded surface, support].
zargu.note: Also ass, behind, butt.  See also {ganxo}, {mabla}.

zasni.definition: x_1 is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property x_2 (ka) by standard/expectant x_3.

zasti.definition: x_1 exists/is real/actual/reality for x_2 under metaphysics x_3.
zasti.note: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place.  x_1 is physical (one sense).  See also {fatci}, {xanri}.

zbabu.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of soap from source x_2 of composition including x_3.

zbani.definition: x_1 is a bay in/of coast/shoreline x_2.

zbasu.definition: x_1 makes/assembles/builds/manufactures/creates x_2 out of materials/parts/components x_3.
zbasu.note: Should not be used to express causation.  Cf. {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.

zbepi.definition: x_1 is a pedestal/base/stand/pallet supporting x_2 (object/event), of materials/properties x_3.

zdani.definition: x_1 is a nest/house/lair/den/[home] of/for x_2.
zdani.note: Home (= {tercnizda}), house (constructed building) (= {zdadi'u}).  See also {dinju}, {ginka}, {kumfa}, se {xabju}.

zdile.definition: x_1 (abstract) is amusing/entertaining to x_2 in property/aspect x_3; x_3 is what amuses x_2 about x_1.
zdile.note: Also: x_1 occupies x_2 pleasantly; x_1 is fun for x_2; x_2 is amused by x_1; x_2 has fun (at) doing x_1; x_1 is an amusement/entertainment/game for x_2.  See also {cinri}, {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.

zekri.definition: x_1 (event/state) is a punishable crime/[taboo/sin] to people/culture/judges/jury x_2.

zenba.definition: x_1 (experiencer) increases/is incremented/augmented in property/quantity x_2 by amount x_3.

zepti.definition: x_1 is 10^{-21} of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

zetro.definition: x_1 is 10^21 of x_2 in dimension/aspect x_3 (default is units).

zgana.definition: x_1 observes/[notices]/watches/beholds x_2 using senses/means x_3 under conditions x_4.
zgana.note: Behold/watch/gaze (= {vi'azga}); guard/watchman/sentinel (= {zgaku'i}, {jdeku'i}).  See also cmavo list {ga'a}, {ganse}, {viska}, {catlu}, {tirna}, {pencu}, {sumne}, {kurji}, {canci}, {catlu}, {jarco}, {lanli}, {pinka}, {simlu}.

zgike.definition: x_1 is music performed/produced by x_2 (event).
zgike.note: x_2 event may be person playing instrument, singing, musical source operating/vibrating, etc.; instrument (= {zgica'a}); play an instrument (= {zgica'apli}, {zgiterca'a}, {selzgigau}, {selzgizu'e}); song (= {sagzgi}, {selsa'a}); voice, as used musically (= {zgivo'a}); composed music (= {finzgi}).  See also {damri}, {dansu}, {flani}, {janbe}, {jgita}, {pipno}, {rilti}, {tabra}, {tonga}, {xagri}, {siclu}.

zifre.definition: x_1 is free/at liberty to do/be x_2 (event/state) under conditions x_3.
zifre.note: Also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained; (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely, may, optionally; (potential:) x_1 voluntarily does x_2.  See also {pinfu}, {rinju}, {bilga}, {curmi}, {kakne}, {frili}.

zinki.definition: x_1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor: hard metal].

zivle.definition: x_1 (agent) invests resources x_2 in investment x_3 expecting return/profit x_4 (object(s)/event).
zivle.note: [also ties up/Risks/gambles.  x_1 is an investor; x_2 are invested assets of x_1; bond (= {jertervle})]; See also {prali}, {canja}, {jbera}, {dejni}, {ponse}.

zmadu.definition: x_1 exceeds/is more than x_2 in property/quantity x_3 (ka/ni) by amount/excess x_4.
zmadu.note: Also positive (= {nonmau}).  See also cmavo list {mau}, {mleca}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {bancu}, {dukse}, {traji}.

zmiku.definition: x_1 is automatic in function x_2 under conditions x_3.

zukte.definition: x_1 is a volitional entity employing means/taking action x_2 for purpose/goal x_3/to end x_3.
zukte.note: Also acting at, undertaking, doing; agentive cause with volition/purpose; also x_3 objective, end.  See also cmavo list {zu'e}, {bapli}, {gunka}, {jalge}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {rinka}, {snuti}, {gasnu}, {fasnu}, {minji}, {prenu}, {ciksi}, {jibri}, {pilno}, {pluta}, {tadji}, {tutci}.

zumri.definition: x_1 is a quantity of maize/corn [grain] of species/strain x_2.

zunle.definition: x_1 is to the left/left-hand side of x_2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x_3.
zunle.note: Also x_3 is the standard of orientation for x_2.  See also cmavo list {zu'a}, {pritu}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}.

zunti.definition: x_1 (evt./state) interferes with/hinders/disrupts x_2 (evt./state/process) due to quality x_3 (ka).
zunti.note: Also blocks, obstructs, baffles; not necessarily forcing cessation. See also {fanta}, {dicra}, {fliba}, {fanza}, {raktu}, {klina}, {bandu}, {cfipu}, {ganlo}.

zutse.definition: x_1 sits [assumes sitting position] on surface x_2.

zvati.note: Atemporal; location equivalent of {cabna}.  Refers to a nonce location for an object/activity that is mobile.  (cf. especially {stuzi} for an inherent/inalienable location, {jbini}, {nenri}, se {vasru}, {cpana}, {diklo}, {jibni}, {cabna}, {lamji}, {tcini}, {xabju}, {jmive}, {jundi}, {vitke})
